Su actividad económica principal de Roxana es la venta de productos de primera necesidad, ella alquila una pequeña tienda donde vende sus productos y le esta yendo muy bien. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va  muy bien, ella en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar y otras cosas más que se necesita para poder abastecer su tienda. 

Roxana pertenece al banco comunal “Kantus” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Roxana is still single and continues to live in the city of Cusco, Peru.  Roxana's  principal economic activity is selling basic necessity products.  She rents a small store where she sells her products and it is going very well.  She has worked in this business for many years and it's going well for her.  She is taking this opportunity to request the loan to buy merchandise, for example sacks of rice, sacks of sugar and other things that she needs to be able to supply her store.

Roxana is a member of the Asociación Arariwa's communal bank "Kantus."  She is grateful for the opportunity offered with this loan and she pledges to make her repayments according to schedule.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, for example sacks of rice, sacks of sugar and other things.

loans.name: Mwanasha

texts.en:
Mwanasha is an enterprising woman and she runs a food stall which is her source of income for herself and to provide for her family. She is 27 and married with three children. She works in her food stall every day of the week, and she can count on a good number of customers who choose her for the quality of the food she sells.

She is requesting a loan to invest it in the purchase of cooking oil, sacks of charcoal, and meat, helping Mwanasha in preserving the influx rate of her customers. This loan will give her the economic resources she needs to stock up her inventory, thus granting her a better profitability.

She wants her activity to grow, as this will provide her with more profit for herself and for her family; she hopes to have a good experience with the current credit and to be able to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase cooking oil, sacks of charcoal, and meat

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is 23 years old and comes from Gaza. He has owned a shop selling clothes for men, women, and children since 2010.

He asked Ryada for this youth loan in order to develop his shop and change the decoration in order to attract more customers. He hopes that this loan will help him improve his income and thus be able to get married.

His ambition is to have a big shop selling clothes.

loans.use: to develop his shop and change the decoration in order to attract more customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To add stock of clothing to the boutique.

loans.name: Shida

texts.en:
Shida, 42, lives with her four children. She has a food stall where she sells basic dishes such as rice, meat stew, and 'ugali' (maize porridge), among others. She’s been working in her business for two years and it’s given her good results. She’s located in a very strategic spot and has acquired a good clientele that prefer her because she always meets their needs with quality products and high hygienic conditions.

Shida is an enterprising woman who very much wants to get ahead and is always alert to new opportunities that will prove to her that she’s able to attain success with hard work and dedication.

Demand has increased so she needs to invest in more dishes in order not to disappoint her customers, which is why she’s asking Yehu for a loan to buy charcoal, beans, flour, and other basic ingredients. Shida is sure that she will be able to repay the loan while at the same time giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy charcoal, beans, flour, and other basic ingredients.

loans.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en:
Mwanamisi is 44, married, and has two children, both in school. She owns a store selling second-hand clothes, and her husband is a carpenter. Both of them have their own businesses, and this is a great example for their children, because it demonstrates the determination and enthusiasm that their parents have.

On this occasion, Mwanamisi is asking for help to buy merchandise for restocking her store. She intends to purchase bundles of second-hand clothes for sale. She wants to make a name for herself and expand her business. She is a very responsible and reliable person, and that is why her customers are loyal to her and her business. Mwanamisi's great desire is to own a boutique in future.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of second-hand clothes for sale.

loans.name: Afrim

texts.en:
Afrim and his family live in Kosovo. He is 38 years old and married. He has three children, two boys and one girl. They live in a village and the children take the bus every day to and from school. 

Afrim has been keeping cows for a long time. He provides milk and milk products to his family and he also sells his products in his area. According to him, the business has been going well. Afrim is requesting a loan to buy a milk cow. In the near future he hopes to expand his farm and to renovate the stable.

His goal is to improve living conditions, and ensure an income for his family. Afrim is very happy about this support!

loans.use: To buy a milk cow

loans.name: Xhavit

texts.en:
As a married man with one child, Xhavit lives together with his family in a small village. The majority of people in his area are unemployed, so they get their income mainly from agriculture. 

Xhavit owns agricultural land and he is keeping cows. Until now he used to pay for plowing his land, because he didn’t have tools for his tractor to plow himself. Xhavit is requesting a loan to buy tools for his tractor, in order to reduce the cost.

Xhavit works hard to support his family. He is very committed and responsible in his work. This loan will be a great help to him and his family, and he is really appreciative of all the support from Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To buy tools for his tractor to work his land

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy underwear and meat for her butcher shop.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TETE CACA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia continua con su negocio de venta de bebidas como agua mineral y gaseosas ,la socia trabaja en un hospedaje donde tambien vende esta mercaderia de bebidas,la socia lleva buen tiempo trabajando con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia a la vez tambien se dedica a la confeccion de tejidos como chompas,chalinas,roponcitos para bebes,la socia trabaja a pedido ,siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de lana de alpaca para su negocio.
                                                                                    
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the communal bank "Señor de Tete Caca".  The bank is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Rosa continues with her business of selling soda and mineral water.  She works in a guest house where she sells the beverages.  She has spent a lot of time working in this business, which is going very well thanks to the effort she puts into it every day.  She also works in tailoring jackets, scarves and christening gowns for babies.  She works by order, and this is the way that she gets her family ahead.

Rosa requests the loan to buy alpaca wool for her business.

Rosa is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy alpaca wool for her business.

loans.name: Mariuska  Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TETE CACA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Mariuska Marina; la socia sigue dedicandose al negocio de venta de manualidades, la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia elabora sus manualidades para luego venderlo de forma ambulatoria a sus clientes que le solicitan como amistades y familiares,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de materiales como tijeras e hilos de diferentes colores para su negocio.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the community bank "SEÑOR DE TETE CACA." The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which is in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The member is Mrs. Mariuska Marina. She works selling handicrafts, and has fun in this business which goes well thanks to the effort that she gives every day to her business. She makes her handicrafts in order to later sell them by traveling around to her customers, whom she greets like friends and family. The member is a responsible, businesslike person who wishes to continue working for her family.

The member is asking for a loan to be able to buy various materials such as scissors and different colored threads for her business.

The member is happy because of the loan and promises to pay the payments on time.

loans.use: To purchase supplies such as scissors and different colored threads for her business.

loans.name: Caridad

texts.en:
Caridad is 46 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with five children.

Caridad has a food/retail shop, or sari-sari store, in which she buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products, and beverages. She had this business for 8 years. She requested a loan of 7,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

Caridad has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, she hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

loans.name: Majaliwa

texts.en:
Majaliwa is 24 years old. She is a friendly, good, and hardworking person. Her partner for the past 2 years is Salim, with whom she has a young baby who is 9 months old. They live in a rental house that has electricity but no piped water. She wants to give the best quality of life to her child and her subsequent children, God willing, based on her efforts and hard work.

She sells food from her place of residence. She is located near a busy street; therefore, she has an advantage of winning more customers. She takes advantage of this opportunity by stocking her business with a large variety of foods so that her customers have more options to choose from. She is conscious of the fact that she has to be very responsible in this type of business. She has been doing this work since last year, and she does it by herself. When she started out, things didn’t go so well, because she needed to attract customers. However, over time, thanks to her good prices and good customer service, she was able to gain the preference of her customers, and now her business is very busy. Her sales are very good. Majaliwa is taking out a loan to invest in her business. With this loan, she will be able to purchase beans, wheat flour, rice, sugar, etc.

loans.use: To purchase beans, wheat flour, rice, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Mwanasiti

texts.en: For more than two years, Mwanasiti has owned her animal-selling business, which is commonly known as a meat goat business. She is 38, married, and has four school-going children. Her husband, Abdalla, operates a butcher shop in the city. Mwanasiti and her husband shared some ideas on how they can progress in life. They came up with the idea of starting this meat goat business. Abdalla can find ready markets for Mwanasiti's goats for slaughter; they can sell the meat to butcheries or in their own butchery. Thank God, they say that it has been a very profitable business. Demand for meat, especially during this festive season of Ramadhan, has increased. She is therefore requesting a loan of 20,000 KES to purchase eight goats for slaughter in order to sell the meat. Their aim is to own another butchery in the near future and ensure that their children are educated. She has the best livestock and that is why her business is developing day by day.

loans.use: to purchase eight goats for slaughter

loans.name: Duvan De Jesus

texts.es:
Duvan, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo porque necesita realizar la compra de insumos agrícolas para iniciar la siembra de maíz y frijol, él se comprará seis sacos de abono dentro de los cuales irán tres de sulfato y tres de fórmula, una bolsa de semillas de maíz y otros materiales para el frijol, actualmente esta por producir la siembra que realizo para invierno.

Esta compra le permitirá a él, contar con lo necesario para poder mejorar la producción del cultivo, con el préstamo anterior logró mejorar sus cosechas, lo que ha logrado mejorar su condición de vida familiar, está muy agradecido con el proyecto kiva.
texts.en:
Duvan has decided to take another loan because he needs to purchase agricultural supplies in order to start planting corn and beans. He will buy six bags of fertilizer, three of sulfate and three of formula, one bag of corn seed, and other materials for the beans. Currently he is about to harvest the planting that he did in winter. 

This purchase will allow him to have what he needs in order to be able to improve his crop production. With the previous loan he succeeded in improving his harvests, which has improved his family's living conditions. He is very thankful to the Kiva project.

loans.use: to purchase 6 bags of fertilizer and corn seed

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is 22 years old and is a mechanic in Nyahururu. He is married to Rahab and they have a three month old child.

This will be his second loan and he plans to use it to buy a welding machine. With the anticipated income, he plans to buy another welding machine.

In the future Robert hopes to grow his business and make more income and thereby improve the living standards of his family.

loans.use: To buy a welding machine.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is a 24-year-old single man from Kisumu and supports no one at the moment.

James is very enterprising, and he sells mobile phone accessories, flash disks, SIM cards, and other items. This is a business he has been doing for the last five years, and he makes a monthly income of KES 15,000. 

He is now taking out his first loan from KADET LTD, which he will use to buy more mobile phone accessories and flash disks to sell. He will use profits to invest back into his business. His dream is to be a successful entrepreneur.

loans.use: To buy more mobile phone accessories and flash disks

loans.name: Joshep Christian

texts.es:
El socio Joshep continua trabajando como restaurador de cuadros de la escuela cusqueña, el socio es experto en el arte de recuperar los cuadros antiguos de la época de la colonia, el socio se desempeña en las distintas técnicas que realiza para una perfecta restauración usando los acabados finos de las antiguas pinturas y lienzos, el estudió el arte con sus técnicas y formas, sus estilos y conocedor de nuestro pasado el socio sigue realizando muchos aportes a nuestra cultura, en esta ocasión el socio sigue en el banco comunal ya que ellos tiene ahorros que les ayuda a generar sus propios intereses, el socio en esta ocasión solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de arte que los artesanos de los pueblo traen para ser exhibidas y venderlas. 

El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de uno o dos cuadros de los artesanos tradicionales.
texts.en:
Joshep continues to work restoring paintings in a Cuzcan school.  He is an expert in the art of restoring antique paintings from the colonial era.  He uses a variety of techniques to carry out a perfect restoration, putting a fine finish on old paintings and canvases.  He studied art, with its techniques, forms, and styles, and knowing the past, he continues to make significant contributions to our culture.   At this time, he is continuing with his communal bank, because they have savings that allow them to generate their own interest.  He is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of art that local artists bring to him, that he will exhibit and sell.

Joshep requests a loan to invest in the purchase of one or two paintings from traditional artists.

loans.use: to buy one or two paintings from traditional artists

loans.name: Fuzuli

texts.ru: Fuzuli imeyet svoyu nebolshuyu studuyu proyavleniya fotografiy. Uje 9 let on zanimayetsya etim delom. V svoyey studii on proyavlyayet fotografii, delayet fotografii dlya passportov, delayet venetki dlya shkolnikov,delayet svadebniye albomi i t.d. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 1500 AZN chtobi kupit noviy kompyuter kotory pomojet yemu v razvitii yego raboti. Fuzuli 46 let. On jivet v Baku regione vmeste so svoyey jenoy i detmi. Fuzuli jenat i imeyet 2 detey.
texts.en: Fuzuli has his own small photo-processing studio.  He has been involved in this business for nine years.  He processes film, makes photographs for passports, does vignettes for school children, makes wedding albums, etc. in his studio.  Currently, he needs 1500 AZN to purchase a new computer, which would help him with developing his work.  Fuzuli is 46 years old.  He lives in the Baku region with his wife and children.  Fuzuli is married and has two children.

loans.use: to purchase a new computer

loans.name: Adham

texts.ru:
Адхам проживает в Спитаменском районе. Ему 29 лет. Он женат. У него один ребенок. Жена Адхама домохозяйка. Его отец таксист. 
Адхам имеет среднее образование. Он занимается купле-продажей крупного рогатого скота. Этим видом деятельности занимается более семи лет. Адхам таким образом зарабатывает на жизнь. Он берет кредит для закупа двух бычков, коровы и теленка.
texts.en: Adham lives in the Spitamen district.  He is 29 years old, married and has one child.  His wife is a homemaker, and his father is a taxi driver.  Adham has a secondary education.  He is involved in buying and selling cattle.  He has been in this business for over seven years.  This is how Adham earns a living.  He is requesting this loan to buy two bulls, a cow and a calf.

loans.use: to buy two bulls, a cow and a calf

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina, 24, is married and she has a small child who is attending school. They live in a rental house that lacks both electricity and piped water, occupying only one small room. 

Amina currently works selling clothes from her home. She sells for credit and for cash. This is the only way that she covers the food expenses and pays for the family's basic services. 

She needs the loan to buy more clothes in order to improve her income and increase her merchandise. 

Amina's dream is to open a boutique and to give her child a better quality of life. 

This is the first time that she has requested a loan from Yehu and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy more clothes in order to improve her income and increase her merchandise.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick has a retail business in Nyahururu town where he sells shoes, bed covers, blankets and other household items. He is 42 years old and married to Virginia, who is a tailor; they have two children. 

This will be his first loan and he plans to buy shoes, new clothes and blankets. Due to the high demand, he anticipates to make more profits with which he plans to buy hardware items and household goods for sale in his business. 

In the future, Patrick hopes to expand his business and open a wholesale shop and become one of the leading businessmen in the area.

loans.use: to buy shoes, new clothes, and blankets.

loans.name: Nurmahmad

texts.ru:
Нурмахмад житель района Джиликул. Он 30-летний женатый мужчина. Имеет одного ребенка. Нурмахмад работает таксистом в свободное время. Также он занимается торговлей. У него имеется магазин со смешанным ассортиментом товара. Торговлей Нурмахмад занимается уже 14 лет. Он добрый и трудолюбивый человек, который старается обеспечить семью всем необходимым. 
Нурмахмад просит кредит для покупки несколько мешков муки, сахара, печеней и приобретения хозяйственных товаров. В будущем он намерен построить не большой дом.
texts.en: Nurmahmad is a resident of the Jilikul district.  He is a 30 year-old married man, who has one child.  Nurmahmad works as a taxi driver in his free time.  He is also involved in sales.  He has a store with a mixed selection of merchandise.  Nurmahmad has been involved in sales in 14 years.  He is a kind and hardworking person, who tries to provide his family with everything necessary.  Nurmahmad is requesting this loan to purchase several bags of flour, sugar, cookies and to buy household goods.  In the future, he intends to build a small house.

loans.use: to purchase household goods and food products

loans.name: Bertha Camila

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TETE CACA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia continua con su negocio de venta de refrigerios,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia elabora hamburguesas,salchipapas,refrescos entre otros,la socia es una persona alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de continuar con su negocio ,a la vez la socia tambien se dedica a la confeccion de trajes tipicos a pedido , siendo de esta manera que la socia sale adelante y tambien puede apoyar a su familia.


La socia solicita el credito para la compra de insumos para la elaboracion de los refrigerios escolares como aceite,pan,galletas entre otros.    
                                                                                
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to “SEÑOR DE TETE CACA” Communal Bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to Cusco Province in the department of Cusco.

This member, Bertha, continues with her business selling light refreshments. She has been in this business for awhile and it has been doing well thanks to the effort she puts into it every day.  She prepares hamburgers, “salchipapas” [fried sausage and French fries] and soft drinks, among other items.  

Bertha is a happy and responsible person who is eager to continue in her business. At the same time she is also dedicated to making traditional dresses, on request. Both her food business and dressmaking endeavor are the ways she is getting ahead and also supporting her family.

Bertha is requesting this loan to purchase supplies to make her school snacks, such as cooking oil, bread and cookies, among other items. She is happy with the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to prepare school snacks, such as cooking oil, bread and cookies among other items.

loans.name: Edgar

texts.es:
Edgar tiene 38 años de edad y tiene dos hijos, él sigue viviendo en la ciudad del Cusco, Perú. Edgar sigue dedicándose a la panadería, él y su esposa Sonia trabajan haciendo diferentes pasteles, panes, tortas y muchas cosas más. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va  muy bien, él en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo sacos de harina, sacos de azúcar, manteca y comprar herramientas como espátulas y moldes. 

Edgar pertenece al banco comunal “Kantus” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Edgar is 38 years old and has two children. He still lives in the city of Cusco, Peru. He still works making bread. He and his wife Sonia work making different cakes, breads, torts, and many other things. They have already been working at this business for several years and it is going very well for him. In this occasion, he needs a loan to be able to purchase inputs for his business, for example, bags of flour, bags of sugar, butter and to purchase tools such as spatulas and molds.

Edgar belongs to the community bank "Kantus" of the Arariwa Association and is happy grateful for the opportunity that it has brought him and again on this loan he promises to make his payments according to the schedule.

loans.use: To buy products such as bags of flour, bags of sugar, butter, and to buy tools such as spatulas and molds.

loans.name: Dina Sidonia

texts.es:
La Señora Dina, tiene 36 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su conyugue y tiene dos hijos, reside en una colonia suburbana del municipio de San Pedro Sula.
Ella tiene 3 años y medio de dedicarse a su propio negocio de elaboración y venta de tortillas, frijoles licuados y comidas. Este negocio lo tiene en su casa y los clientes son de su comunidad. Trabaja muy duro todo el día para obtener los ingresos que necesita para el sustento diario de su familia. Esta solicitando el segundo préstamo a ODEF, el cual es por 13,000 Lempiras de este préstamo ella va cubrir gastos de graduación de su hija mayor que esta por graduarse y un 20% más o menos lo invertirá en compra de insumos para la elaboración de tortillas y comida, porque su negocio siempre quiere tenerlo activo.  Su meta a corto plazo es lograr la graduación de su hija mayor que es su gran sueño y que su negocio siga estable y continuar aumentando los ingresos para una mejor vida familiar.
texts.en:
Dina, 36, lives in a common law relationship with her spouse; she has two children and lives in a suburban neighborhood in San Pedro Sula.

She’s had her own business making and selling tortillas, beans, blended drinks and meals for three and a half years.  Her business is home-based and her customers are from her community.  She works hard all day to earn income needed for her family’s daily sustenance.  

She’s asking ODEF for her second loan for 13,000 lempiras to cover her oldest daughter’s graduation expenses and more or less 20% of it will be used to buy supplies to make tortillas and food because she wants to keep her business active always.  Her short-term goal is to attain her daughter’s graduation which is her great dream and that her business continues stable to continue increasing income in order to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make tortillas and food (20%) and the rest to pay for her daughter's graduation expenses.

loans.name: Everlyn

texts.en:
Everlyn is 38 years old and married, with three children who are all in school. 

Everlyn has a general shop which she has been operating for the past three years. She has applied for her second loan to enable her buy more sugar, cooking oil, soft drinks, etc. to add to her stock. 

She hopes to open a supermarket in the near future.

loans.use: To buy sugar, cooking oil, and soft drinks

loans.name: Salama

texts.en:
Salama sells foodstuffs from home and lives with her three children. She is 39 and a single hardworking mother who struggles to ensure that she has satisfied the needs of her family since she is the breadwinner. She learned to make food such as flat breads, dumplings, etc. when she was living with her parents. Today, she already has an established business with several customers. 

She is requesting a loan to buy wheat flour, beans, rice and cooking oil. This will allow her to increase her business, increase her food production, and improve the variety of products she sells. The loan will give her the necessary financial resources, so that she can make the proper investment. 

Her aim is to see her business gradually grow, by adding other kinds of products. This allows her to have several ways of bringing in money. She also wants to undertake a few improvements to her home someday.

loans.use: to buy wheat flour, beans, rice, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Shuhrat

texts.ru: Шухрат родился 1983 году в районе Джиликул. Он живет с женой. У него двое маленьких детей. Шухрат занимается растениеводством. Он более тринадцати лет занимается посевом и продажей пшеницы, кукурузы и хлопка. Шухрат просит кредит для закупа минеральных удобрений, чтобы получить хороший урожай. Он за счет полученной прибыли хочет купить себе автомашину.
texts.en: Shuhrat was born in 1983 in the Jilikul district.  He lives with his wife and has two small children.  Shuhrat is involved in agriculture.  He has been involved in sowing and selling wheat, corn and cotton for over thirteen years.  Shuhrat is requesting this loan to buy mineral fertilizers in order to get a good harvest.  He wants to use the resulting profit to buy himself a car.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Zucy Emperatriz

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TETE CACA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia continua con su negocio de venta de ropa interior,ella vende truzas,polos entre otros,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia ,la socia vende su mercaderia en una tienda que se encuentra ubicado por el centro de la ciudad,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando y de esta manera apoyar economicamente a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de truzas al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Zucy Emperatriz is a member of the communal bank "Señor de Tete Caca".  The bank is located in Cusco district, which is part of the department of Cusco and province of Cusco.

Zucy continues with her underwear sales business.  She sells briefs and polo-shirts among other items.  Zucy has been in this business a long time, which is going well thanks to the effort she puts in each day.  She sells her merchandise in a store that is located in the center of the city.  She is a responsible and hardworking person with a lot of motivation to keep working and in this way support her family economically.

Zucy requests the loan to buy wholesale briefs.

She is happy about the loan, and pledges to comply with her repayments.

loans.use: to buy wholesale briefs.

loans.name: Zoilo Leoncio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TETE CACA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Zoilo Leoncio; El socio continua con su negocio de venta de productos agroindustriales ,el socio lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio a la vez el socio tiene otro negocio de cabinas de internet ,el socio se siente feliz ya que le va bien y el desea poder continuar con sus negocios para de esta manera seguir apoyando a su familia,el socio es una persona responsable  con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando.
El socio solicita el credito para el mantenimiento de sus computadoras.


El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "Señor de Tete Caca", located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

The member is Zoilo Leoncio.  He continues with his business selling agroindustrial products.  He has been working in this business for a long time, which is going well thanks to the effort he puts in each day.  At the same time, he has another business, an internet stand.  He is happy since it is going well and he wishes to be able to continue with his business so he can continue supporting his family in this way.  

The member is a responsible person with a lot of motivation to continue working.  He requests the loan for the maintenance of his computers.  

He is happy about the loan and is committed to making the payments.

loans.use: to maintain his computers.

loans.name: Máxima

texts.es:
La soci se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de quesos,yogurt y manjares,la socia elabora sus productos con leche de vaca y luego los vende todos los dias en la ciudad de Cusco,ella le gusta preparar los quesos,yogures y manjares,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 8 años en este negocio,el sueño de la socia es ampliar y tener un local donde pueda vender los lacteos.La socia solicita el credito para comprar leche y azucar.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member is still selling cheese, yogurt and treats. She makes her products with dairy and later sells them everyday in the city of Cusco as she enjoys preparing cheese, yogurts and treats. The member works from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. and has worked in this business for some 8 years. Her dream is to expand and to have a place to sell her dairy products. The member needs the loan to buy milk and sugar.

The member is happy for the loan and is committed to meet all of her payment quotas.

loans.use: buy milk and sugar.

loans.name: Marleni

texts.es:
La socia  es la señora Marleni, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de los Milagros de Chimpahuaylla” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. La socia se sigue dedicando al comercio de productos de primera necesidad en su tienda de abarrotes y paralelamente también vende materiales de construcción como arena, yeso, tejas y ladrillos. Marleni realiza estas actividad hace tiempo y es con esta que ha sacado adelante a sus 4  hijos, aun dependientes de ella.  Marleni trabaja para poder darles a sus hijos una mejor educación, y por ello invertirá su préstamo para comprar mercadería como arroz, azúcar, leche, fideos, bebidas gaseosas etc. para su comercio de abarrotes, ya que la parte del comercio de materiales de construcción mayormente se encarga su esposo.
Marleni está muy feliz y agradecida con KIVA por permitirle dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y ayudarla a mantener y desarrollarse en sus actividades económicas.
texts.en: Marleni is a member of the “Señor de los Milagros de Chimpahuaylla” communal bank in the city of Cusco, Perú.  She continues working selling basic staple items in her grocery store and also sells building supplies like sand, plaster, roofing tiles and bricks.  Marleni has been doing this for some time now and has been raising her four dependent children by means of it.  Marleni works in order to give her children a better education which is why she’ll invest her loan in the purchase of merchandise like rice, sugar, milk, noodles, soft-drinks, etc. for her grocery store since the building supplies business is mostly in her husband’s hands.  Marleni is very happy and grateful to KIVA for making it possible for her to give her family a better quality of life and for helping her maintain and develop her economic activities.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for grocery store, including rice, sugar, milk, eggs, candy, soda, etc.

loans.name: Dina

texts.es:
Dina, tiene 46 años de edad, vive en una colonia cercana a Chamelecón, San Pedro sula junto a su esposo, 4 hijos y dos nietos.
Dina tiene 15 años de dedicarse a la elaboración de tortillas para la venta, siempre le ha gustado esta actividad. Este producto tiene gran demanda ya que por costumbre se consume si es posible los tres tiempos de alimentación. Ella necesita este préstamo de 10,000 Lempiras para capitalizarse y comprar el insumo que es el maíz, cal y leña para mantener estable el negocio de elaboración y venta de tortillas de maíz. Este préstamo es el sexto que ha solicitado y lo ha utilizado para mantener el negocio. Su meta es aumentar la producción para obtener sus ingresos necesarios para el hogar.
texts.en:
Dina, 46, lives in a neighborhood near Chamelecón, San Pedro Sula with her husband, four children and two grandchildren.  She’s been making tortillas to sell for the last 15 years.  This product is in high demand because it’s usual to be eaten three times a day at each meal. 

She needs a 10,000 lempira loan to capitalize and buy corn, lime powder and firewood to stay in business making and selling corn tortillas.  The loan is the 6th one she’s requested to keep her business stable.  Her goal is to increase production to earn income needed for the home.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make tortillas and firewood.

loans.name: Robiya

texts.ru:
Робия занимается домашним хозяйством. Большую часть своего времени она проводит на участке, где выращивает овощи.  Робия проживает в районе Шахритус. Ей 49 лет. Она замужем. У нее семеро детей. 
Робия берет кредит в нашей организации, чтобы начать свою деятельность. На полученный кредит Робия купит двух бычков и теленка. После продажи она купит еще несколько голов, таким образом она увеличить поголовья скота. Этот вид деятельности позволит ей увеличить доходы семьи.
texts.en: Robiya is involved in household work.  She spends the majority of her time on her land, where she grows vegetables.  Robiya lives in the Shahrituz district.  She is 49 years old, married and has seven children.  Robiya is requesting this loan from our organization to start her business.  She plans to use the loan to buy two bulls and a calf.  After the resale, she will buy several more heads of livestock in order to increase livestock headcount.  This business will allow her to increase the family's income.

loans.use: to buy two bulls and a calf

loans.name: Mosoc Killa Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “MOSOC KILLA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Lilian ella es casada y tiene 41 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de taller de carpintería, la socia junto con su esposo trabajan haciendo camas,puertas,ventanas entre otros trabajos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,en algunas oportunidades la socia no puede hacer trabajos de puertas grandes porque la madera sube su precio y para ella es complicado comprar pero felizmente con el trabajo duro que ella y su esposo realizan pueden juntar dinero y comprar su herramienta de trabajo, la socia ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le gusta realizar trabajos en madera, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de taller de carpintería. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar madera y herramientas para su taller de carpintería. Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de cafetería, negocio de músico, negocio de venta de productos de belleza, negocio de carpintería y negocio de venta de ropa.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the community bank "Mosoc Killa". This bank is located in the district of Cusco, belongs to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The member is Mrs. Lilian. She is married, 41 years old, and has two children. She works with her carpentry business. Along with her husband, she works making beds, doors, and windows among other things. She works from 8:00am until 7:00pm. For some opportunities, she cannot make large doors because the price of wood has cone up and for her it is complicated to make purchases. However, she happily works hard so that her and her husband can get some money together and and buy tools for her work. She already has been working for five years in this business and enjoys working with wood. Through this business, she is providing a better life for her children. Her dream is to increase the size of her carpentry business. She is asking for a loan to buy wood and tools for her carpentry business. The other members work in the cafeteria business, the music business, selling beauty products, the carpentry business and the clothing retail business.

She is very thankful to whoever becomes a part of this dream through this medium (Kiva) and promises to pay the loan dues according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy wood and tools for her carpentry store.

loans.name: Allin Muju Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “ALLIN MUJU”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maria ella es soltera y tiene 40 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de crianza de animales, la socia cría pollos y cuyes ella los hace engordar y crecer y luego lo vende en las diferentes mercados, la socia siempre le gusto los animales ya son 6 años que se dedica al negocio de crianza de animales, anteriormente la socia se dedicaba al negocio de tienda de abarrotes pero no le fue muy bien en este negocio porque los productos empezaron a subir de precio, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 4:00 p.m,el sueño de la socia es tener un lugar más amplio donde pueda criar los animales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cuyes y pollos y también para comprar alimentos para los animales.
La socia que esta pegada a la foto grupal se le tomo despues la foto, porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo. 
Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de venta de pollos, negocio de tienda de abarrotes, negocio de venta de confección de ropa, negocio de carpintería y negocio de construcción.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These associates are part of the Communal Bank “ALLIN MUJU”. This bank is in the Cusco district, which is in both the province and department of Cusco.

This associate’s name is Maria. She is a single, 40-year old with 3 children. She has her own business breeding animals. She breeds chickens and guinea pigs; she fattens them up and raises them to then sell them in different markets. The associate has always liked animals and has been in this line of work for the last 6 years. Before this, she had a grocery store, but this business didn’t go well because the prices starting going up. She works from 8am to 4pm. Her dream is to own a bigger area where she can breed her animals. The associate is soliciting a loan to buy guinea pigs, chickens and food for the animals.

Her photo is the inset of the group photo – she was given permission, because of work, to have her photo taken afterwards. 
The other associates have businesses such as poultry sales, grocery store, clothing design and sales, carpentry, and construction.
The associate is grateful to those who have become a part of her dream through this medium and she promises to make her payments in the time allotted.

loans.use: buy guinea pigs, chickens and food for the animals.

loans.name: Elisabel

texts.es: Un préstamo de 5,300 pesos ha ayudado a Elisabel a comprar una nueva estación para lavar el pelo, ya que la que tenía se le rompió. Elisabel es casada. Su esposo es vendedor de galletas y caramelos en los semáforos. Elisabel y su esposo tiene 3 hijos de 12, 8 y dos años. Los que están en edad escolar asisten a la escuela. El mayor anhelo de Elisabel es poder cada día suplir junto a su esposo para las necesidades de su familia, así como para su educación. Su sueño es poder construir una casa de blocks, ya que actuamente es de Zink y tablas de madera.
texts.en: A loan of 5,300 pesos will help Elisabel buy a new washing hair station since the one that she had broke. Elisabel is married; her husband sells cookies and candy in the traffic lights. Elisabel and her husband have 3 children of 12, 8 and 2 years old, the ones that are of school age go to school. Elisabel’s greatest dream is to work everyday with her husband to meet the family’s needs, especially education. Her dream is to be able to build her home with cement bricks since at present it is made up of zinc and wooden planks.

loans.use: buy a new washing hair station.

loans.name: Jura

texts.ru: Чура проживает в районе Джиликул. Ему 53 года. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Его сын находится на заработках за рубежом. Чура предоставляет услугу, такси. Он более 32 лет в этой области. Кредит берет для ремонта своего автомобиля, чтобы продолжить свою деятельность.
texts.en:
Jura lives in the Jililkul region. He is 53 years old, married, and has four children. His son is working abroad. 

Jura offers a tax service. He has over 32 years of experience in this field. 

The loan is being taken for repairs to his automobile to continue his activities.

loans.use: to repair his automobile

loans.name: Bakhtovar

texts.ru:
Бахтовар родился 1991 году в районе Восеъ. Он женат. Живет вместе с родителями. Его отец и брат работают в России. 
Бахтовар имеет среднее образование. Он зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Бахтовар разводит скот у себя дома. Он разводит скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Этим видом деятельности Бахтовар занимается уже три года. 
Бахтовар берет кредит для закупа несколько голов бычков.
texts.en:
Bakhtovar was born in 1991 in the Vose region. He is married and lives with his parents. His father and brother are working in Russia. 

Bakhtovar has a secondary education. He earns a living by breeding cattle. Bakhtovar raises livestock at his home. He tends cattle for sale in the future. Bakhtovar has been involved in this activity for three years. 

Bakhtovar is taking a loan to buy several heads of cattle.

loans.use: to purchase a few heads of cattle

loans.name: Damaris Marcia

texts.es: Damaris,  de 43 años de edad,  es originaria de las comarcas Las Banderas en las  afueras de Teustepe, es madre de 4 hijos, aunque  no esté casada pero vive con el padre de sus hijos, ella mantiene solo a dos de sus hijos que son los menores de edad, los otros dos son independientes. Ella tiene una pulpería, la cual tiene 8 años de tenerla. Inicio vendiendo solo dulces y galletas  eran dos tarros llenos de caramelos y 2 paquetes de galletas sus clientes más constantes eran los niños que a diario visitaban su negocio en busca de dulces, chicles, galletas en especial las de chocolate. Poco apoco fue ahorrando para comprar más mercadería y surtir mas su negocio hasta lograrlo convertir en una pulpería , su pareja la apoyo desde el principio . Hoy en día vende granos basicos, pan , huevos, jugos, gaseosas, cosméticos. Los cuales son productos de mucha necesidad en su comunidad es por ello que esta solicitando el crédito para comprar jabones, detergentes, avenas, productos enlatados, salsas, pasta de dientes, jugos, gaseosas, snacks, mantequilla ,pan. Ella necesita este crédito para surtir su pulpería con productos que a diario busca su clientela y así mejorar las ventas  y hacer crecer la pulpería, desea ofrecer más variedad con productos de mucha utilidad y necesidad.
texts.en:
Damaris, 43, is from Las Banderas district in the outskirts of Teustepe.  She’s the mother of four children although she’s not married but does live with her children’s father.  She only supports two of her children who are still minors; the other two are independent.  

She has had a grocery store for 8 years.  She started out just selling candy and cookies; she had two jars filled with candy and two packages of cookies.  Her most reliable customers were children who came by daily to visit her store looking for candy, gum and cookies, especially chocolate ones.  Gradually she saved up to buy more merchandise and stock more until she turned her business into a grocery store.  Her spouse helped her out since the beginning.  

Today she sells basic grains, bread, eggs, juices, soft-drinks and cosmetics which are products that are much needed in her community which is why she’s asking for a loan to buy soap, detergent, oats, canned goods, sauces, toothpaste, juices, soft-drinks, snacks, butter and bread.  She needs this loan to stock her store with products her customers look for daily to improve sales and make the grocery store grow; she wants to offer more variety with quality products that are needed.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Haykaz

texts.en:
Haykaz is still running his trading business and taxi driving. Thanks to his occupations, Haykaz provides for his family and also he was able to organize his daughters’ weddings. Haykaz runs his trading business in a rented place at the market. Recently he rented a plot of land for a long time, where he will build his own shop. This fact will allow Haykaz to cut down his business expenses in the future and to serve his customers in more favorable conditions. 
His first Kiva loan Haykaz used to enlarge his business assortment. Now he needs a 1,000,000 AMD loan to buy slippers, sandals, panama hats, straw hats, etc. to resell. He says that this merchandise is in popular demand in the summer and holiday season. Haykaz will use his future income for his new shop construction.

loans.use: to buy slippers, sandals, panama hats, straw hats, etc. to resell

loans.name: Alejadro

texts.es: El Sr. Alejandro de 38 años de edad, es casado y tiene dos dependientes económicos,  tiene mas de 12 años  trabajando en una fabrica de la localidad y su esposa quien labora en la misma fabrica  tiene apenas un año.  El sabe que en orden para que su familia este bien tiene que brindarles un buen hogar, es por eso que el pide de nuestra ayuda para poner un porton porque sabe que la seguridad es lo mas importante en estos tiempos. El y su familia agradecerán la ayuda que se les quiera brindar.
texts.en: Mr. Alejandro is 38 years old, married and has two people who are financially dependent on him. He has worked for over 12 years in a local factory and his wife is also working in the same factory but has only done so for about a year. Mr. Alejandro knows that for his family to be well he needs to give them a good home, which is why he needs our help to put a large door because safety is the most important thing in these times. Mr. Alejandro and his family are grateful for the help that you are able to bring.

loans.use: build a large door in his home.

loans.name: Rehema

texts.en:
Rehema is 52 years old. She is single and the mother of two children, one in school while the other is an adult. They rent a house where they live, in the town of Msambweni in southern coast of Kenya. This is where Rehema works selling fish, which is what she has done since she began her business.

Rehema needs the loan to buy stock of fish and cooking oil. With the loan, she is planning on improving her business.

Rehema's dream is to open a kiosk in the future.

loans.use: to buy stock of fish and cooking oil.

loans.name: Zainabu

texts.en:
Zainabu is 20 years old. She is a single beautiful lady who operates a clothes selling business. She has been in the business for the past two years.

This is Zainabu's second loan from Yehu, but the first with Kiva. She was introduced to us by one of our field officers. She will use the loan amount to purchase more clothes to sell. 

Zainabu lives in her own house on her parents' homestead. She is a responsible lady who has been a resourceful person in the family. She sells her clothes by retail. 

She hopes to be financially stable and to open a shop. She also plans to save money and join college later.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma lives in the Msambweni area of Coast province. She has five children, four of whom are adults while one is still in school. She earns a living through the sales of kerosene to the neighborhood.

Fatuma learned about Yehu through a friend, with the aim of accessing credit to improve her business operations. The challenges she is facing is price fluctuation of the commodity.

Fatuma is applying for a loan of 15,000 Kenyan shillings to buy a gallon of kerosene to sell. Her extra income from the loan will be added to savings to start other businesses and to pay school fees for her last born who is in high school. Her future plan is to start another business and continue educating her child.

loans.use: to buy a gallon of kerosene to sell.

loans.name: Zainabu

texts.en:
Zainabu is a hardworking, enterprising woman who operates a clothes selling business.She has been in this business for the last two years, selling from home. Thanks to her hard work and loans she’s managed to improve the business. She now requests a loan in the amount of KES 30,000.

She will use the loan to buy bundles of khangas to sell. Zainabu has a good credit reference and she hopes to repay her loan and acquire more loans to invest in her business. She is working hard to see that her dream of opening a boutique has been met. Zainabu is married to Mwachoro, a police officer. Together they have four school-going children.

loans.use: to buy bundles of khangas to sell.

loans.name: Vandy's Group

texts.en:
Vandy is a 42-year-old married father of two children, one daughter and one son, both of whom are still dependent on him and they are still in school. To make a living, he works as a security guard in market, located in a local area and his wife runs a small food stall in the village. Together, they are able to save about 20,000 KHR per day after all expenses. 

Vandy’s group consists of two members; both are the third loan cycled clients. He has managed to successfully use the past two loans to attain a standard of living better than before and increase family's income. Now, he and his group member are seeking for a new loan in amount of 1,000 USD each. He, as the group leader, will use his loan portion to buy a motorbike as a means of transportation to support his wife's business better. With this loan, he hopes to own a motorbike in order to save his traveling time to better support his family's current business and use his spare time to better care for his children.

loans.use: to buy motorbike for supporting his wife's business.

loans.name: Eulalio

texts.es:
El señor Eulalio se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 30 años, el habita en la comunidad las nubes, su principal actividad es la siembra de Maiz, el inicio a trabajar desde muy pequeño con sus padres y es por esa razón que se ha dedicado toda su vida al trabajo de campo. 
El ha sido un hombre luchador y eso le ha permitido llevar el sustento a su hogar.
texts.en:
Eulalio  has been involved in agriculture for the past 30 years.  He lives in the community of Las Nubes, where his principal activity is the planting of corn.  He began to work when he was very young with his parents, and for this reason he has dedicated his whole life to working in the countryside.

He has been a real fighter and this has allowed him to cover the costs of his household.

loans.use: to cover agricultural expenses for corn and herbicides

loans.name: Marizela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR DE TETE CACA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Marizela; La socia continua trabajando en una empresa privada de lunes a viernes durante el dia,la socia a la vez es abogada de profesion ,la socia asesora la venta de inmuebles a sus clientes que solicitan sus servicios profesionales,ella es una persona responsable y empeñosa con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia,siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.


La socia solicita el credito para la salud de su hijo en la compra de medicamentos.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Marizela is a member of the communal bank "Señor de Tete Caca"  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, province of Cusco and department of Cusco.

The member is Marizela.  She continues working in a private company Monday - Friday during the day.  She is, at the same time, a lawyer.  The member is a real estate sales agent for clients who request her professional services.  She is a responsible and hard-working person with motivation to continue working for her family, this being the way that she gets her family ahead. 

She requests a loan to buy medicine for her son's health.

Marizela is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy medicine for her son's health.

loans.name: Nicanor

texts.es:
El señor Nicanor es casado y tiene 2 hijos, él sigue dedicandose a la carpinteria, el socio sigue realizando diversos trabajos de manera independiente de carpintería como por ejemplo muebles de madera(estantes, camas, puertas, sillas, mesas, etc), él tambien se dedica a la reparaciones de muebles y otros. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. El señor Nicanor en esta ocasión requiere el crédito para invertir en su taller de carpintería y desea comprar herramientas y tambien materiales de trabajo como clavos, madera, cola de carpintero y otras cosas mas. 
 
El socio sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal ”KANTUS”de la Asociacion Arariwa. El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Nicanor is married and has two children. He is still working in carpentry and continues to do various carpentry projects independently like wood furniture, (shelves, beds, doors, chairs, tables etc.) he is also engaged in the repair of furniture and other things. He has been doing this work for several years and is doing very well. On this occasion, Nicanor wants a loan to invest in his carpentry shop and would like to buy tools and other work materials like nails, wood, wood glue and other things. 

Nicanor is still a member of the communal bank “Kantus” of the Arariwa Association. He is grateful for the loan and agrees to comply with the repayments according to the payment schedule.

loans.use: buy tools and also other work materials like nails, wood, wood glue and other items.

loans.name: Eduviges

texts.es:
Un préstmo de 10,600 pesos ha ayudado a Eduviges a comprar 3 cajas de leche evaporada, 5 cajas de maltas y una tostadora para su cafetería. Eduviges tiene más de 5 años con su cafetería y es muy popular en su comunidad por los jugos de fruta y empanadas de pollo. Eduviges es madre soltera y tiene cuatro hijos, que ya se han casado todos. Con Ella vive su primera nieta, una asolescente de 15 años que está en la escuela secundaria, de quien es responsable por sus estudios y manutención.
El deseo de Eduviges es poder proveer suficiente cada dia para ella y su nieta. Su sueño es convertirse en suplidora de empanadas para otras caferetías.
texts.en:
Eduviges is soliciting a loan of 10,600 pesos ($275) to help her buy 3 cases of evaporated milk, 5 cases of malt and a toaster for her cafeteria.
Eduviges has been running her cafeteria for more than 5 years and it’s very popular in her community for the fruit juice and chicken empanadas. Eduviges is a single mother with 4 children, who are all married. Her first granddaughter lives with her, as does a 15-year old adolescent for whom she has taken responsibility for his care and studies. 
Eduviges wish is to be able to provide every day for herself and her granddaughter. Her dream is to become a supplier of empanadas to other cafeterias.

loans.use: buy 3 cases of evaporated milk, 5 cases of malt and a toaster for her cafeteria.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana es una mujer microempresaria que formo parte de un banco mujer El Divino niño, posteriormente toma la decisión de sacar un préstamo individual, fundamentalmente por poder adquirir un monto mayor que permitiera el desarrollo de su actividad comercial,ella vive en la provincia de Puntarenas, en el distrito de Corredor, sector Cuidad Nelly, desde hace diez años se dedica a la actividad de comercio ambulante, principalmente con venta de articulos de catálogo, cosméticos y zapatos, mediante el sistema de crédito.
El préstamo se utilizara para reforzar el capital de trabajo,especificamente se destinara a la compara de articulos de catálogo, cosmeticos y articulos para el hogar, que es una linea nueva, que tiene muy buena venta. 
Una de las razones por lo que Juana, acude a Fundación Mujer, es que los proveedores de estos articulos de catálogo, ofrecen un crédito a 30 días, por lo que tenia que pedir una parte del valor del articulo cuando realizaba la venta y la otra contra entrega de la mercadería, lo que hacia que muchas personas no pudieran adquirir sus productos, con el crédito pudo ofrecer un plazo mas largo y esto hizo que aumentara su cartera de clientes, ya que podia ofrecer un crédito mas acorde a las capacidad de pago de sus clientas.
Dentro de su planes futuros esta el poder apoyar a su hija en el desarrollo de su actividad productiva, artesana de la confección de tarjetas para diversas ocaciones, bodas, cumpleaños, así como la elaboración de bisutería artesanal con piedras y semillas, que tienen una buena aceptación dentro del público; ya que esta hija tomo la decisión de ser una trabajadora independiente al igual que su madre.
texts.en:
Juana is a micro businesswoman who formed part of the “El Divino Niño” communal bank but then decided to take out an individual loan basically in order to acquire a larger amount so she could develop her commercial activity.  She lives in Puntarenas Province in Corredor District, Ciudad Nelly Sector.  She’s been a merchant for the last ten years mainly selling catalogue items like cosmetics and shoes on credit.  She will use the loan to strengthen her working capital.  Specifically, she’ll use it to buy catalogue items like cosmetics and articles for the home which is a new line that sells well.

One of the reasons why Juana is calling on Fundación Mujer is that the suppliers of these catalogue items only offer 30 days’ credit which meant she had to collect part of the price of the item when she sold it and the other part when she delivered it which in turn meant that many people couldn’t afford to buy her products.  With the loan she was able to offer a longer payment plan which led to increased number of customers since she could now offer credit more in line with her customers’ ability to pay.

Within her future plans is to be able to support her daughter in the development of her productive activity: crafts production of all-occasion (wedding, birthday, etc.) greeting cards as well as making artisanal costume jewelry with beads and seeds that are well-received by the public since her daughter has decided to be an independent worker just like her mother.

loans.use: to buy catalogue items: cosmetics, shoes and articles for the home.

loans.name: Igbol

texts.ru:
Игбол житель города Куляб. Ему 47 лет. Она женат. У него пятеро детей. Игбол более десяти лет предоставляет услугу, такси. Он развозит пассажиров по маршруту Душанбе – Куляб. 
Игбол просит кредит для приобретения автомашины марки Opel. Так как машина этой марки экономично расходует топлива.
texts.en:
Igbol is a resident of the town of Kulyab. He is 47 years old, married, and has five children. For more than ten years, Igbol has been offering a taxi service. He transports passengers along the route from Dushanbe to Kulyab. 

Igbol is requesting a loan to buy a car of the brand Opel, because this brand is known for its fuel economy.

loans.use: to purchase a motor vehicle

loans.name: Estevan

texts.es:
Con un prestamo de 36,750 pesos Estevan podrá completar el dinero para comprar una camioneta para su negocio de compra y venta de chatarra. Estevan inició en este negocio hace más de 15 años y es el único medio de sustento para él y su familia. Estevan es divorciado y tiene dos hijos de 13 y 12 años, ambos chicos estudian y en la tarde practican baseball. De San Pedro, la ciudad de Estevan, han salido muchos peloteros de Grandes Ligas, entre ellos Sammy Sosa por lo que es un sueño para todo padre y chico de San Pedro el llegar a ser "firmado" por un equipo de las ligas mayores de los Estados Unidos.
"Quiero comprar una camioneta para poder comprar chatarra en lugares que por distancia ahora no puedo llegar, ya que quiero terminar de construir mi casa y apoyar a mis hijos con su educación y manutención"
texts.en:
With a loan of 36,750 pesos, Estevan will be able to have enough money to buy a truck for his business of buying and selling junk. Estevan began his business over 15 years ago and it is the only source of income for his family and himself. Estevan is divorced and has two children of 13 and 12 years of age, both children are in school and in the afternoons enjoy playing baseball. Estevan’s native city, San Pedro, has borne many Major League players including Sammy Sosa which is why the dream of every father and child in San Pedro is to be ‘signed’ by a major league team of the United States.
 “I want to buy a truck to be able to buy junk in places, that because of distance I’m not able to go, since I want to finish building my home and to help support my children with their education and financially.”

loans.use: buy a truck for his business of buying and selling junk.

loans.name: Abdusattor

texts.ru: Абдусаттор житель города Куляб. Ему 27 лет. Он холост. Живет с родителями. Имеет среднее образование. Абдусаттор милый и добрый молодой человек. Он любит свою работу. Он более шести лет предоставляет услугу. Абдусаттор работает таксистом. В основном он развозит пассажиров по маршруту Душанбе-Куляб. Кредит берет для покупки оптом арбуза для торговли. Этот вид деятельности для него является сезонным.
texts.en:
Abdusattor is a resident of the town of Kulyab. He is 27 years old, single and has a high school education. 

Abdusattor is a nice and kind young man. He loves his job as a taxi driver. For more than six years, he has been providing this service. In general, he delivers passengers along the route from Dushanbe to Kulyab. 

The loan is for the purchase of watermelon wholesale for trade. This is a season activity for him.

loans.use: to purchase watermelon wholesale

loans.name: Norik

texts.en:
Norik and his wife are still farming. With joint effort they breed cattle, grow apples, pears, plums, potatoes, tomatoes, wheat, etc. Thanks to farming Norik keeps his family and pays his daughter’s tuition fees. 

Norik used his first Kiva loan for hay collection organization. Now he is asking for a loan which he will also use to organize hay collection (to rent out a tractor and hire an operator, to buy diesel fuel) and to also buy wheat seeds. He needs a 900,000 AMD loan to accomplish these plans.

loans.use: to organize hay collection and to buy wheat seeds.

loans.name: Mahmadnazar

texts.ru:
Махмадназар проживает в городе Куляб. Ему 37 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Махмадназар имеет средне - специальное образование. По специальности он водитель. В этой области Махмадназар более 16 лет. Он работает таксистом. Махмадназар развозит пассажиров по городу.
Махмадназар просит кредит для покупки запчастей для автомобиля.
texts.en:
Mahmadnazar lives in the town of Kolyab. He is 37 years old, married, and has five children. Mahmadnazar has a specialized secondary education. By profession, he is a driver. Mahmadnazar has more than 16 years experience in this area. He work as a taxi driver. Mahmadnazar delivers passengers to the city. 

Mahmadnazar is requesting a loan to buy spare parts for the car.

loans.use: to buy spare car parts

loans.name: Namozkul

texts.ru:
Намозкул проживает в Яванском районе. Он трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек. Намозкул работает дехаканском хозяйстве в качестве тракториста. Он получает хорошую прибыль. Но этих денег не хватает, чтобы обеспечить семью, так как он один зарабатывает в своей семье. Его дети взрослеют, их необходимо женить и выдать замуж. Таким образом Намозкул решил заняться скотоводством в свободное от работы время. Намозкул просит кредит для закупа бычков и телят в дальнейшем для продажи. 
У Намозкула на сегодняшний день имеет одна дойная корова, которая обеспечивает его семью молоком и молочными продуктами. Намозкул женат. Ему 44 года. У него четверо детей.
texts.en: Namozkul lives in the Yavan district.  He is a hardworking and goal-oriented person.  Namozkul works as a tractor driver at a dekhan farm.  He makes a good profit, but this money is still not enough to provide for the family because he is the sole income earner in the family.  His children are getting older, and it will be necessary to marry them off.  Therefore, Namozkul decided to get involved in animal husbandry during his time free from work.  He is requesting this loan to buy bulls and calves for subsequent resale.  Today, Namozkul has one dairy cow that provides the family with milk and dairy products.  Namozkul is 44 years old, married and has four children.

loans.use: to buy bulls and calves

loans.name: Arman

texts.ru:
Арман занимается сельскохозяйственным бизнесом в деревне Сюник, Сюникской области. Арман разводит крупный рогатый скот и свиней. Полученную сельскохозяйственную продукцию: молоко, говядину и свинину  он реализуются в городе Капане как на рынке, так и через скупщиков. Доход получаемый от ведения сельского хозяйства позволяет Арману содержать семью. Семья Армана состоит из его родителей и младшего брата, которые помогают ему на ферме. 
Арману 26 лет. Ему очень нравится заниматься сельскохозяйственным бизнесом, поэтому он работает на своей ферме с раннего утра до позднего вечера (с 7:00 – 22:00).
Арману необходим кредит на сумму 500.000 драм для приобретение корма на зиму для скота.
texts.en: Arman is involved in an agricultural business in the Syunik village of the Syunik region.  He breeds cattle and pigs.  He sells agricultural products, such as milk, beef and pork, at a market in the city of Kapan and through resellers.  The resulting income from running the agricultural business allows Arman to support his family.  His family consists of his parents and a younger brother, all of whom help him at the farm.  Arman is 26 years old.  He likes to be involved in the agricultural business very much, and this is why he works on his farm from the early morning to the late evening (from 7:00 until 22:00).  Arman needs a loan in the amount of 500,000 dram to purchase livestock feed for the winter.

loans.use: to buy livestock feed for the winter

loans.name: Theogene

texts.en:
Theogene is 26 years old and is single. Theogene sells various goods such as lotions, soap, biscuits, cakes, sugar, etc. He has three years of experience in this work. 

Theogene has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to buy various goods such as lotions, soap, biscuits, cakes, sugar, etc. for resale. With any profits, he will be able to save money for his future and reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To buy various goods such as lotions, soap, biscuits, cakes, sugar, etc. for resale.

loans.name: Mentor

texts.en:
Mentor is a single man. He lives with his parents in a small village in Kosovo. Mentor is a hard worker and a responsible person.

Three month ago he opened a small restaurant in his village where he makes breakfast, lunches and dinners. He makes chicken, kebab, soups, working from 8:00am until 6:00pm. He usually makes lunches and dinners because the products are expensive and he can’t buy enough. He has request the loan amount to pay for inventory, for meat and other goods for his restaurant. He is happy about the loan and promises to make his payments according to the schedule.

loans.use: to pay for inventory, for meat and other goods for his restaurant.

loans.name: Mchalika

texts.en:
Mchalika is 53 years old and lives in Msambweni, a town in the coastal region of Kenya. She is married and has 8 children, four of whom are in school. 

Mchalika earns a living through the sales of kerosene. She has had this business for two years. She says that it has been a profitable project since the majority of the people in the neighborhood have not yet accessed electricity. She has requested a loan of 20,000 KES to establish a grocery store. With the loan, she will be able to purchase fruits and vegetables, and for the labor costs of constructing the stall. In the future, Mchalika hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables, and cater for the labor cost for constructing the stall.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La socia Sonia se sigue dedicando a la elaboración de panes, pasteles, tortas y otras cosas más, ella sigue teniendo una panadería y actualmente a incorporado los pasteles para la venta, ella prepara kekes de vainilla y chocolate llamados kekes marmoleados y pie de manzana. La socia Sonia en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar de harinas, levaduras, esencias entre otros. 

La socia Sonia sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Kantus” de la Asociación Arariwa y se encuentra agradecido por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Sonia, the associate, continues baking bread, pastries, torts and other things. She continues her bakery business and has added pastries for sale, like vanilla and chocolate cakes called “kekes marmoleados” (marble cake) and apple pie. The associate, Sonia, would like to request a loan at this time, to buy flour, yeast and extracts, among others.

Sonia continues to be part of the Communal Bank “Kantus” of the Arariwa Association. She is grateful for the opportunity she has been given through this medium and she promises to make her payments on schedule.

loans.use: buy flour, yeast and extracts, among others.

loans.name: Evelia Del Socorro

texts.es: Doña Evelia es de la comarca Las Banderas, Teustepe. Ella tiene una pulpería de venta de granos básicos la cual la inicio hace 4 años con fondos propios capital que obtuvo al vender unas  vacas ya que también se dedica a ordeñar.   Ella dice que hace 4 años se le vino la idea de poner una venta ya que miro que ese lugar era adecuado para el negocio. Evelia dice que todos sus hijos están casados y solo un hijo que vive con ella es quien le ayuda en la venta además que cuida a sus nietos. Con este crédito   quiere surtir un poco más la venta comprando diferentes productos tales como productos de limpieza, jugos, gaseosas, carne, pollo, embutidos, aceite de cocinar, manteca salsas, shampoo, jabones de baño.  Este crédito le será de ayuda ya que al estar más surtida la venta venderá más y ofrecer más variedad de productos a sus clientes. Ella dice que una vez que pague el crédito sacara otro para comprar vitrinas, exhibidores para colocar sus productos y estén en un mejor lugar.
texts.en:
Evelia is from Las Banderas District, Teustepe.  She has a grocery store where she sells basic grains.  She started it four years ago with her own capital that she got from selling some cows since she’s also a milk producer.  She says that she got the idea of opening a store four years ago since she noticed that that place was adequate for the business.  Evelia says that all her children are married and only one son still lives with her and helps her with the sales and also takes care of her grandchildren.

With this loan she wants to stock the store a bit more buying various product s like cleaning supplies, juices, soft-drinks, meat, chicken, cured meats, cooking oil, lard, sauces, shampoo and bath soap.  This loan will help her be better stocked and sales will increase more by her offering wider variety to her customers.  She says that once she pays off the loan she’ll take out another one to buy display cases to better exhibit her wares.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Larisa

texts.ru:
Лариса занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью в деревне Бех, Сюникской области, на протяжении 25 лет. На своей ферме Лариса разводит кур, выращивает овощи, фрукты и орехи. Полученную продукцию: яйца, орехи, овощи и фрукты Лариса реализует в городе Капане. Благодаря выручке, получаемой от ведения сельского хозяйства, Лариса имеет возможность содержать семью.    
Ларисе 56 лет. Она окончила финансово-экономический техникум и в данный момент, параллельно с занятием сельскохозяйственным бизнесом, она работает бухгалтером в пенсионом фонде. Лариса замужем и у нее трое детей: две дочери и сын. Обе дочери замужем и проживают отдельно от родителей, сын женат и вместе с семьей живет вместе с родителями. Сын Ларисы работает в военной части, а также помогает Ларисе на ферме. Муж Ларисы работает егерем в лесном хозяйстве, а в свободное от работы время помогает жене на ферме.  
Лариса получала кредит от организации Нор Оризон (Nor Horizon) дважды, а сейчас ей необходим кредит в размере $ 1.350 для приобретения лошади и закупки сена на зиму для лошади. Лариса уверена, что лошадь очень необходима в хозяйстве. С помощью лошади можно привозить древесину и т.д. из труднодоступных для машины мест.
texts.en: Larisa has been involved in an agricultural business in the Bekh village of the Syunik region for 25 years.  She keeps chickens, grows vegetables, fruits and nuts on her farm.  She sells her agricultural products, such as eggs, nuts, vegetables and fruits, in the city of Kapan.  Thanks to the profit from running the farm, Larisa has the ability to support her family.  Larisa is 56 years old.  She graduated from a financial-economics college and currently works, parallel to her agricultural business, as an accountant at a retirement fund.  Larisa is married and has three children: two daughters and a son.  Both of her daughters are married and live away from the parents, and the son is married as well, but lives together with his family and the parents.  Larisa's son works at a military base and also helps Larisa with the farm.  Larisa's husband works as a forest ranger at a forestry and also helps his wife with the farm during his free time.  Larisa has obtained loans from the Nor Horizon organization twice before and now needs a loan in the amount of $1,350 to purchase a horse and hay for it for the winter.  Larisa is certain that the horse is very necessary for her farm.  It would be possible to bring wood and the like from unreachable by car places with the help of a horse.

loans.use: to buy a horse and fodder for it

loans.name: Mwanajuma

texts.en:
Mwanajuma is a 41 year old woman who is married to Suleiman. They have 6 children and all of them are attending school. Her spouse is an area assistant chief; thanks for his responsibility as the bread winner and for his provisions to the family. Mwanajuma manages a retail shop which has been active for the last three years. She says that she got her working capital from her husband.

Due to the decrease in her inventory, Mwanajuma has requested a loan from Yehu so as to increase her inventory. With this loan, she will be able to purchase sacks of beans, green peas, wheat flour, sugar, etc.

Her cry is to own a wholesale business in the future and to hire some employees. Mwanajuma is grateful to both Kiva and Yehu for the opportunity to invest in her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of beans, green peas, wheat flour, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Jairo
