texts.es: Jairo cuenta que el primer crédito q le otorgo Kiva atravez de MiCredito lo utilizo para comprar colchas para vender  con lo cual mejoro el inventario del negocio además compro  productos varios para la venta  y productos plásticos, está muy agradecido por la oportunidad que obtuvo atravez del financiamiento. Este nuevo crédito lo quiere para comprar forros de tijeras q tiene encargados y productos para la venta tales como jugos, gaseosas, avenas, aceite ,pan, galletas, snacks, productos de limpieza. Siempre tiene sub meta de lograr comprar una parcela de tierra para sembrar arroz, frijoles y maíz. También desea mejorar la infraestructura de su humilde vivienda para ofrecerle algo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
Jairo relates that he used the first loan he got from Kiva through MiCredito to buy bedspreads to sell which improved his business inventory; he also bought various products and plastic items to sell.  He’s very grateful for the opportunity he got through the loan.

He will use this new loan to buy scissor sleeves he has pending orders for as well as products to sell like juices, soft-drinks, oats, oil, bread, cookies, snacks and cleaning supplies.  His goal has always been to buy a parcel of farmland to grow rice, beans and corn.  He also wants to improve the infrastructure of his humble abode to offer something better to his family.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Diana Gerardina

texts.es: Diana, tiene 39 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene dos hijas y vive en el municipio de Villanueva, Cortes. Ella tiene dos años de haber establecido su negocio en una cafetería que alquila. Vende golosinas como dulces, churros, jugos, pan, agua refrescos y comidas. Este negocio está ubicado en un punto estratégico enfrente a fábricas y vende todo el día. Esta solicitando un préstamo de 5,000 Lempiras para comprar insumos para elaborar comida para la venta como ser: carnes, condimentos, arroz, y refrescos, churros y otros. Con esta inversión espera que su negocio se mantenga estable y poder aumentar las ventas. Su gran esfuerzo es obtener ingresos para el sustento de su familia.
texts.en:
Diana, 39, is a single mother; she has two daughters and lives in the town of Villanueva, Cortes.  She opened a cafeteria two years ago in a rented space.  She sells snacks like candy, snacks, juices, bread, water, soft-drinks and meals.  This business is located in a strategic spot across from factories and she sells all day.

She’s asking for a 5000 lempira loan to buy ingredients for the meals she sells like meat, condiments, rice, soft drinks, snacks and others. With this investment she hopes her business will remain stable and her sales will increase.  Her great effort is to earn income to support her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de ganaderia,la socia vende leche ya que sus ganados producen leche,la socia la leche lo vende en la ciudad de Cusco,la socia ya tiene 5 años que se dedica al negocio de ganaderia y negocio de venta de leche,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño del socio es tener un local donde pueda vender la leche.La socia solicita el credito para comprar 1 ganado y alimentos para los ganados.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member is still in the cattle business; she sells milk that her dairy cows make and sells it in the city of Cusco. She has been in the cattle and dairy milk business for 5 years and works from 8:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. and through this business the member is able to see that her children get ahead in life. Her dream is to have a stall where she can sell the milk. The member needs the loan to buy a dairy cow and food for her cattle.

The member is happy for the loan and is committed to meeting all of her payment quotas.

loans.use: buy a dairy cow and food for her cattle.

loans.name: Halima

texts.en:
Halima is 52 years old and lives with her two children who are still in school. Her first three children are adults and independent. She owns a grocery store where she sells staple products like tomatoes, onions and bananas, among other items. Other sources of income come from her husband and children. She has had the business for several years. She is very well known in the area and has many customers because all that she sells is of high quality, at affordable prices and the service is excellent.

Halima is an entrepreneurial woman who is very dedicated to her work. She hopes that the future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. She wants to see her business grow and needs to invest in supplies. For this reason she is requesting a loan from Yehu so that she will be able to purchase tomatoes, onions, potatoes, bananas, etc. Halima is certain that she will be able to pay back the loan and at the same time give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase tomatoes, onions, potatoes, bananas, etc.

loans.name: Eunice

texts.en:
Eunice has been in farming activity and the business is doing great. She normally plants maize which is doing so well. 

She is applying for her second loan from KADET LTD to enable her to buy some maize seeds to use during this planting season. 

She hopes to grow her business and eventually start large scale farming in the future.

loans.use: To buy maize seeds for planting.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es:
Pablo, esta casado y tiene dos hijos que están en etapa escolar, viven en casa de sus padres ocupando dos habitaciones, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Sopocachi de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente percibe ingresos que provienen de  trabajar por más de diez horas al día cono conductor de un vehículo de pasajeros en el área urbana, ya que debe solventar los gastos de alimentación, educación y pago de servicios básicos; es por eso que solicita el crédito  para el pago del mantenimiento de su vehiculo (cambio de aceites, chequeo de frenos, cambio de filtros)  ya que lo necesita mucho por que es su única fuente de trabajo que tiene  para mantener a su familia.
El sueño de Pablo, es adquirir una casa en anticrético para brindar más comodidad a su familia y mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la primera vez que solicita el crédito junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Pablo is married and has 2 children who are school-aged.  They live in two rooms in his parents' house.  The house is located in the Sopocachi neighborhood of the city of La Paz.

He is currently earning income from his work providing passenger transportation in the urban area.  He works 10 hours a day, because he needs to cover his family's expenses for food, education and basic services.  He is requesting a loan to pay for maintenance work on his vehicle (oil change, brake check, filter changes), because he needs to maintain his vehicle as it is the only source of work that he has to support his family.

Pablo's dream is to acquire a house through an "anticretico" (a type of lease arrangement), so that he can provide more comfort to his family and improve their quality of life.  This is the first time that he has taken a loan from IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for maintenance on the vehicle he uses to provide passenger transportation services

loans.name: Jessica Magaly

texts.es:
Jessica Magali tiene 21 años de edad es divorciado tiene un hijo, vive en Guaranda provincia de Bolívar junto al hijo y a unos familiares.

Jessica Magali es diseñadora de vestidos, además se dedica a realizar bordados. Solicita el crédito para pagar la matrícula de la universidad.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá matricularse y poder seguir estudiando para culminar la carrera.

Es pago de la matricula lo hará en Guaranda. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es terminar los estudios. El sueño es poder  tener un negocio  rentable. 
En el tiempo libre le gusta visitar a los familiares.
texts.en:
Jessica Magali is 21 years old, is divorced and has a child. She lives in the city of Guaranda, province of Bolívar with her child and some family members.

Jessica Magali designs dresses and also makes embroidery. She needs the loan to pay her university tuition.

With the loan she will be able to matriculate and to keep studying to finish her education.

The tuition will be paid in Guaranda. The challenge that she faces is finishing her education. Her dream is to have a profitable business.

During her free time she enjoys visiting her family.

loans.use: pay her university tuition.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Doña Rosa es una clienta con 37 años de edad, madre de dos hijos y vive en unión libre con su pareja. Desde hace varios años vió la necesidad de satisfacer a su comunidad brindando los servicios de costuras y asi superarse personalmente. Se dedica a coser a la medida, hacer arreglos a diferentes prendas de vestir y también a confeccionar ropa, cortinas y otros. Ella ayuda a su hogar económicamente, dedica bastante tiempo a su negocio sin descuidar a su familia, y en temporadas altas beneficia a otras personas dándoles trabajo.
texts.en: Rosa, 37, is the mother of two children and lives with her spouse in a common law relationship.  Several years ago she saw the need of satisfying her community offering sewing services and thus improving herself too.  She sews to order making various articles of clothing and also clothes, curtains and others.  She helps her home economically and dedicates quite a bit of time to her business while not neglecting her family.  During high seasons she benefits others too by providing them employment.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Leocadia

texts.es:
La socia continua dedicandose al negocio de venta de leche ,la socia vende de forma ambulatoria en las distintas ferias que se realizan los fines de semana en el distrito de Cusco,a la vez la socia tambien se esta dedicando a la ganaderia ,ella cria a sus vacas para luego venderlas a sus clientes que le solicitan,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de leche para su negocio.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues working selling milk; she sells her product as a street vendor in different markets that are made during the weekends in the district of Cusco. At the same times she is also in the cattle business, she breeds cows to sell to the customers. The member is a responsible and eager person with a lot of drive to keep working for her family.

The member needs the loan to buy milk for her business.

The member is happy for the loan and is committed to paying all of her quotas.

loans.use: buy milk for her business.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de ganaderia,la socia vende leche ya que son ganados son lecheros,la socia tambien se dedica al negocio de crianza de cuyes,ella los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en los diferentes mercados,la socia ya tiene 8 años en estos negocios,por medio de estos negocios la socia quiere sacar adelante a sus hijos porque quieren que sean profesionales,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los cuyes y la leche.La socia solicita el credito para comprar 1 ganado y tambien para comprar alimentos para los cuyes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues in the cattle business, she sells milk since she has dairy cows. She also has a business breeding cuyes (a hamster like animal) she fattens and grows them and later sells them to different markets. She has over 8 years in these businesses and through these businesses the member wants to see that her children get ahead in life because she wants them to be professionals, her dream is to have a place where she can sell her cuyes and milk. The member needs the loan to buy 1 cow and to buy food for the cuyes.

The member is happy for the loan and is committed to meeting all of her payment quotas.

loans.use: buy 1 cow and to buy food for the cuyes.

loans.name: Walter

texts.es:
El socio se dedica al negocio de ganaderia,el socio tiene 8 vacas que producen leche y luego los vende en la ciudad de Cusco en forma ambulatoria,el socio tambien se dedica a la agricultura tiene un terreno donde cultiva maiz y papa,el socio ya tiene 9 años trabajando en el negocio de agricultura y ganaderia,por medio de estos negocios el socio saca adelante a sus hijos ya que su sueño es que sean profesionales.El socio solicita el credito para comprar 2 ganados y comprar alimentos para los ganados.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Walter has a livestock business.  He has 8 cows that produce milk, which he later sells from place to place in the city of Cusco.  He also works as a farmer, cultivating corn and potatoes on some land that he has.  He has been working in agriculture and livestock production for 9 years, and through these businesses he helps his children to get ahead, because his dream is that they become professionals.  He is requesting a loan to buy 2 cows and to buy feed for the cows.

Walter is pleased to be getting this loan, and he promises to comply with the payment terms.

loans.use: to buy 2 cows and feed for the cows

loans.name: Cirila

texts.es:
La socia continua dedicandose a la ganaderia y agricultura ,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio,la socia siembra lo que son maiz y papa,la socia vende su mercadria en las distintas ferias que se realizan los fines de semana en el distrito de Anta,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de semillas y fertilizantes para su chacra.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Cirila continues working in farming and animal husbandry.  She’s been in this business for quite some time and does very well thanks to the effort she puts into it.  She grows corn and potatoes and sells her merchandise in various street markets occurring on weekends in Anta District.  She’s a responsible, determined person who very much wants to continue to work for her family.  She requests the loan to buy seeds and fertilizer for her field.  She’s happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loans.name: Mehriban

texts.en:
Loans from KosInvest to the Roma Community in Kosovo have helped to improve their life and business. They have provided the opportunity to improve their various businesses and create working environments.

Among the people who have benefited are Mehriban and her family.

Mehriban is 42 years old. She is married and raising six children. Mehriban spends most of her time taking care of her children and her home. 

Mehriban bought a engine for the saw to help her husband with woodcutting.

For more than 30 years her husband has provided woodcutting services for heating in his community. Through his work he helps his family and gives them everything they need.

They are very happy to have the possibility of getting a loan as they have the chance to improve their living conditions and have healthy food.

loans.use: To buy a engine for the saw for cutting the wood.

loans.name: Jeisson Jonathan

texts.es:
Jeisson tiene 20 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Imperial, ciudad que se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura, en especial el cultivo de maíz, algodón, entre otros. Vive al lado de su madre y de sus 2 hermanos menores a quienes apoya con el fruto de su trabajo ya que los ingresos de su madre son pocos, Jeisson se encontraba estudiando la carrera de enfermería, pero dejo estudiar porque tenía que seguir trabajando para poder apoyar en su casa, actualmente el se dedica a sus trabajos como músico y cantante y él cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy carismáticos y porque es cumplido con los clientes.

Jeisson esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podra realizar mejoras en su vivienda ya que comprar esteras y plásticos para mejorar el techo de su vivienda, ya que cuando llueve mayormente se inunda su vivienda; con esta mejora el podrá darle una mejor calidad de vida para su familia y poder seguir trabajando muy duro para hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Terminar su carrea y tener una orquesta musical propia”.
texts.en:
Jeisson, 20, lives in Imperial, a city known for its warm and pleasant climate.  The city sits among many farms where farmers grow maize, cotton and other crops.  Jeisson lives with his mother and his 2 younger siblings.  His earnings are the main source of income for the family because his mother earns very little.  Jeisson studied for a nursing degree before, but had to stop and go to work in order to support his family.  He works as a musician and singer and tells us that he is doing well because he is charismatic and his customers like his work.  

Jeisson is grateful to Kiva because he will be able to use your loans to make much-needed improvements to his family's house.  He will buy mats and plastic roofing materials to repair his roof.  The repairs are necessary because water pours in and floods the house when it rains.  Your loans will allow him to improve his and his family's quality of life and continue working toward his dreams of "finishing his degree and having his own band".

loans.use: to purchase matting and plastics to reinforce his roof

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
Luz tiene 21 años de edad, es una joven muy trabajadora y sobre todo porque es madre de un pequeño de 2 años de edad, por el cual se esfuerza mucho para poder sacarlo adelante y sobre todo que sea una persona de bien, el es su motor ´para seguir cada día a pesar de los inconvenientes que se puedan presentar y sobre todo porque con ver su sonrisa puede hacerla olvidar sus preocupaciones. Cuando dispone de un tiempo libre le gusta mucho preparar postres pero sobre todo le encanta preparar su platillo favorito el cual es el riquísimo “Arroz con Pato”. Luz es de condición humilde y debido a sus bajos recursos ella solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria pero le hubiera gustado estudiar para ser una enfermera.

Con mucha dedicación Luz trabaja como obrera en una empresa agroexportadora de su distrito, ella labora alrededor de 8 horas al día, pero los días domingos trabaja alrededor de 12 horas, Luz se esfuerza mucho en su trabajo ya que con ello puede solventar los gastos de su hogar; ella cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y sobre todo muy honrada.

Luz está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que el han bridando ella podrá realizar mejoras en su vivienda como refacción de su techo, ya que es de esteras y comprar plásticos para protegerlos de la lluvia, así de esta manera tendrá más seguridad en su vivienda y seguirá trabajando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño.” Tener su casa propia y darle una buena educación a su hijo”.
texts.en:
Luz is 21 years old, a hard working young lady, and above all because she is a mother of a 2 year old she struggles hard in order to get ahead and above all to be a good person, and he is the driving force to keep going each day despite of the hardships that can turn up and most of all because she can see his smile, making her forget her worries. When she has free time she likes to prepare desserts but what she loves the most is preparing her favorite dish which is the delicious “Arroz con Pato” (rice with duck). Luz is humble and because of her low income she only could study through 5th grade of secondary school, but she would have liked to study to be a nurse.

Luz works hard as a worker in an agro-exporting company in her district. She works around 8 hours a day, but on Sundays she works about 12 hours. Luz puts a lot of strength into her work as this is the way that the household expenses can be met. She believes that things are going well in her work because she is very responsible and above all very honest.

Luz is very grateful for the Kiva loans and thanks to the support she will be able to make improvements to her housing such as repairing the roof, as well as buy mats and plastic to protect them from the rain, and thus will have more security in her housing and will continue working in order to be able to achieve her greatest dream, “to have her own house and give a good education to her child.”

loans.use: to improve her housing (buying mats and plastics)

loans.name: Matilde

texts.es:
La socia continua dedicandose a la ganaderia ,la socia cria a las vacas para luego venderlas en las distintas ferias que se realizan los fines de semana en el distrito de Anta,la socia a la vez vende leche que extrae de las mismas vacas para distribuirlo a sus clientes que le solicitan,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de una vaca pequeña.

 
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member is in animal ranching, and she raises cows to sell them in different markets that happens on the weekends in the district of Anta.  The bank member also sells the milk that she gets from the same cows to distribute to her customers when they ask.  She has spent years in this business, which is going well for her thanks to the effort she puts into every day, this being the way that she helps her family to get ahead.

She is asking for this loan to buy a small cow.

This member is happy about the loan and promises to make timely payments.

loans.use: to buy a small cow.

loans.name: Elsa Piedad

texts.es:
Elsa Piedad tiene 22 años de edad es soltera tiene un hijo de cinco años de edad vive con el hijo en Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar

Elsa Piedad es dedica a realizar quehaceres domésticos. Solicita el crédito para comprar ganado vacuno.
Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar el ganado al contado y aún buen precio.  Las compras y las ventas lo hace en Guaranda. 

El sueño es poder comprar un terreno, Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es poder pagar puntual el crédito. En el tiempo libre le gusta  mirar televisión.
texts.en:
Elsa Piedad is 22 years old and sigle, and she has a 5 year old child.  She lives with her child in Guaranda, in the Bolívar province.

Elsa Piedad is a domestic laborer.  She is asking for a loan to buy a cow.

With the help of her loan, she will be able to buy this cattle at a good price.  The buying and selling will be done in Guaranda. 

Her dream is to be able to buy a plot of land.  Her greatest challenge is to pay her loans punctually.  In her free time she likes to watch television.

loans.use: to buy beef cattle.

loans.name: Osman Emir

texts.es: Osman,29 años de edad,  es de la comarca Las Banderas, Teustepe, casado padre de  dos hijos  se dedica al comercio ya que tiene una pulpería de granos básico, juegos de nintendo  además tiene un Cyber el cuales de mucho utilidad ay que en su comunidad es un servicio que muy pocos tiene y que es de mucha utilidad y necesidad sobre todo en los estudiantes del pueblo el dice que inicio este proyecto hace 4 años  ya que antes trabajaba en acarreo con un camión que le había dado su papa. El dice que el negocio por estar en su casa lo apoya mucho la esposa también dice que además alquila sillas y mesas plásticas Osman ha trabajado en crédito con otras instituciones y hoy quiere trabajar con Kiva atravez de MiCrédito este  préstamo  piensa invertirlo para comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite ,frijoles, frutas, plátanos, verduras, productos de limpieza, productos para la cocina, como salsas y especias. Este crédito le ayudara a aumentar la ventas ya que invertirá mas en productos y tendrá mayor ganancia y una vez que cancele invertirá en mejorar las vitrinas y estantes de la pulpería.
texts.en:
Osman, aged 29, is from the region of Las Banderas, Teustepe.  He is married and the father of two children, and he owns a small grocery store where he sells dry goods, Nintendo games, and he also has an internet cafe which is very useful.  In his community, very few people have internet, and so it's a great necessity and useful especially for the students in the area.  He says he started this business about 4 years ago, and before that he worked in transport, using a truck that his father gave him.

He says that the business, by being in his home, is greatly helped by his wife as well, and that he also rents out plastic tables and chairs.  Osman has taken loans from other institutions and now wants to work on this loan with Kiva through MiCrédito.  He thinks he will invest the money in buying rice, sugar, oil, beans, fruit, plantains, vegetables, cleaning products, and kitchen staples, like sauces and spices.  This loan will help him to increase his sales, since he will have a greater number of products, and he will bring in more profits and have greater earnings.  Once he has paid off his loans, he will invest in better glass cases and shelving for the grocery.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil, beans, fruit, plantains, vegetables, cleaning products, and kitchen staples, like sauces and spices.

loans.name: Yanet

texts.es:
La socia continua dedicandose a la ganaderia ,la socia cria a las vacas para luego venderlas en las distintas ferias que se realizan los fines de semana en el distrito de Anta,la socia a la vez vende leche y queso  que extrae de las mismas vacas para distribuirlo a sus clientes que le solicitan,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia,la socia sale en la foto con su hija.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de una vaca pequeña.

 
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Yanet continues working in animal husbandry; she raises cows to then sell in various street markets occurring on weekends in Anta District.  She also sells milk and cheese she gets from the same cows to sell to customers that request it.  She’s been in business several years and does well thanks to the effort she puts into it every day.  This is how she supports her family.  She appears in the photo with her daughter.  She’s asking for the loan to buy a small cow.  She’s happy with the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy a small cow.

loans.name: Fredrick

texts.en:
Fredrick is thirty-eight years old, married, and has four children. He has been running a cereal business for the last 15 years earning monthly income of 17,000 Kenyan Shillings (KES). 

He has applied for his third loan of 35,000 KES from KADET Ltd., with which he plans to purchase more stock of dried maize, beans and peas. 

The anticipated profits he will invest back into his business. His future dreams are to have a happy family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of maize, beans, and peas.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es:
La joven Reyna Isabel  labora como secretaria academica del colegio Cesar Augusto Salinas Pinell desde hace años, su compañero de vida  se desempeña como mecanico como propietario del taller ambos se ayudan con los gastos familiares ya que son bien unidos.
Solicita se le apoye con este refinanciamiento para pagar gastos de maestria  en Educaciòn con especialidad en Didactica en la Universidad Nicaraguense UENIC.

Su sueño es culminar la maestria, gozar de salud, estabilidad laboral  y que su preciosa familia permanezca unida.
texts.en:
Young Reyna Isabel works has worked as an academic secretary in the Cesar Augusto Salinas Pinell School for several years. Her life partner works as a mechanic and owns the shop; both help each other with family expenses since they are very close.

Reyna Isabel needs help in paying for her Masters in Education, specializing in Didactic Education in the Nicaraguan University UENIC.

Her dream is to finish her masters, be healthy, have job stability and that her precious family will always be united.

loans.use: pay for her Masters in Didactic Education.

loans.name: Andres Alfonso

texts.es:
Andrés, de 52 años de edad, habita en la ciudad de León, padre de 6 hijos ,se dedica a la venta de hielo y a reparar celulares. Empezó su negocio debido la situación económica y la escasez de empleo, además que la comida y vestimenta de sus  hijos no le permitía estar si generar ingresos para el hogar. Empezó desde muy abajo vendiendo hielo, además que la ciudad es de temperatura altas así que la afluencia de clientes en busca de hielo es muy constante. Aprendió a reparar celulares negocio que también le ayuda a generar ingresos. Ya tiene 10 años con estos dos negocios. Le gustaría tener una tienda donde venda repuestos de celulares y electrodomésticos. Una de sus metas es reparar su casa y comprar vitrinas  para poner en exhibición los nuevos repuestos y accesorios para celulares.
El esta requiriendo el préstamo para comprar un frezer y comprar accesorios de celulares para vender.
texts.en:
Andrés, 52, lives in the city of Leon and is the father of 6 children.  He has a business selling ice and repairing cellular phones.  He started his business because of the economic situation and the shortage of employment opportunities.  Also, he cannot be without income for the household, due to the need to feed and clothe his children.  He started at the bottom selling ice, because the city has a very hot climate, and there is a constant flow of customers in search of ice.  He learned to repair cellular phones, a business that helps him to generate more income.  Now he has 10 years of experience with these two businesses.  He would like to have a store where he could sell parts for cellular phones and appliances.  One of his goals is to repair his home and buy glass display cases to exhibit the new parts and accessories for cell phones.

He needs a loan to buy a freezer and to buy cell phone accessories to sell.

loans.use: to buy a freezer and cell phone accessories

loans.name: Wendy Carolina

texts.es:
Wendy de 28 años, casada, tiene un hijo y vive en el municipio de Omoa, Cortes.
Ella tiene un año de tener un negocio en su casa de venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, zapatos y otros cuando le piden los clientes. Ha mantenido estable el negocio mediante préstamos que ha solicitado a ODEF, actualmente solicita uno de 21,000 Lempiras y es el número 8, con el cual va surtir de mercadería nueva como ropa para damas, caballeros y niños para poder incrementar las ventas y obtener más ganancias.
Su meta es que el negocio crezca y sea un patrimonio para su hijo.
texts.en: Wendy, 28, is married and has a son; she lives in the town of Omoa, Cortes.  She’s been in business one year.  She has a business at home selling clothes for women, men and children; she also sells shoes and whatever else customers request.  She’s kept the business stable by means of ODEF loans.  She’s currently asking for a 21,000 lempira loan, her 8th, to stock up on new merchandise like clothes for women, men and children to be able to increase sales and earn more profits.  Her goal is that the business grows and be an asset for her son.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise.

loans.name: Reina Isabel

texts.es:
Reina tiene 47 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos y vive en  el Municipio de Omoa, Cortes junto a dos hijos.
Ella tiene su propio negocio de pulpería en su casa, negocio que estableció hace 7 años del cual obtiene los ingresos que necesita para el sostenimiento de su familia. Vende arroz, frijoles, manteca, pan, huevos, embutidos, refrescos, dulces y hasta algunos productos de cosméticos. Ya ha trabajado con varios préstamo para mantener estable el negocio, el actual que solicita es el numero 9 y es por 10,000 lempiras, el cual lo utilizara para surtir la pulpería de mas productos alimenticios. Su meta es tener el negocio estable y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Reina, 47, is a single mother; she has three children and lives in the town of Omoa, Cortes, with her children.  She has her own home-based grocery store, a business she established 7 years ago that produces income needed for her family’s sustenance.  She sells rice, beans, lard, bread, eggs, cured meats, soft-drinks, candy and even some cosmetics.  She has already managed loans to keep the business stable.  The one she’s asking for now is loan #9 and it’s for 10,000 lempiras that she’ll use to stock the store with more food items.  Her goal is to keep the business stable and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Lisbeth Carina

texts.es:
La socia Lisbeth Carina, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Los Lideres” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. La socia sigue con su trabajo como docente de educación primaria, y ahora y a diferencia de que originalmente queria abrir una tienda de abarrotes, paralelamente ahora tiene un restaurante, el cual aperturó con mucho esfuerzo para el bienestar de toda su familia. Lisbeth Carina en esta oportunidad invertirá el préstamo solicitado comprar insumos como papas, verduras, arroz y otros insumos para la producción de su restaurante.

LA socia Lisbeth Carina está muy agradecida con KIVA por permitirle dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y ayudarla a mantener y desarrollarse en sus actividades económicas.

La socia Lisbeth Carina agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
This member is Sra. Lisbeth Carina.  She belongs to the Communal Bank “Los Lideres” (The Leaders) in the city of Cusco, Peru.  Lisbeth Carina continues her job as an elementary school teacher.  Now the only difference was that she originally wanted to open a grocery store, but instead she has a restaurant that she established with great effort so that she could provide for the welfare of her entire family.  

Lisbeth Carina is taking this opportunity to invest the loan she requested in the purchase of supplies such as potatoes, vegetables, rice, and other items for her restaurant.  She is extremely grateful to Kiva for enabling her to improve her family’s quality of life and helping her to maintain and develop her business activities.  

She appreciates the loan and promises to complete her payments according to schedule.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, vegetables, rice, and other supplies.

loans.name: Ramon

texts.es: Ramon tiene 53 años de edad, es conviviente y con 04 hijos a su cargo. Vive en casa propia con su conviviente y sus hijos. La casa está ubicada en el distrito de Tambogrande al norte del peru y el vive en la parte rural del distrito que cuenta con los servicios básicos. El y su esposa siempre han tenido amor por la comida, y su esposa en particular tiene muy buen sazon al cocinar. Juntos han establecido un negocio de picantería en su propio domicilio, el cual es atendido por ellos mismos. Normalmente, los dias mas ocupados son los días sábados, domingos y lunes. Cuenta con clientela ya estable en la zona y con una experiencia de más de 6 años. Viendo que el negocio va bien, ahora han pensado en tambien ofrecer a su clientela una gama mas amplia de bebida y han acudido a Edpyme Alternativa y Kiva para un prestamo de 1000 nuevos soles, El destino del crédito será para la compra de cerveza para vender en su picanteria. Ramon complementariamente trabaja en un fundo agrícola en donde es peón estable y recibe un sueldo mensual, lo cual tambien le ayuda a ser responsable con sus deberes familiares y economicos.
texts.en: Ramon is 53 years old, he lives with his life partner and they have 4 children. Their house is located in the Tambogrande district, in the north of Peru, and he lives in the rural area of the district that is equipped with basic services. He and his wife have always loved food, and his partner uses particularly good flavors when cooking; for this reason, they have opened and they run a snack bar in their own house. Saturdays, Sundays and Mondays are typically the busiest days; they have fixed customers in the area and they can count on a 6-years’ experience. Seeing that the activity is going well they have been considering offering a wider choice of drinks to their customers, and they have come to Edpyme Alternativa and to Kiva to ask for a loan of 1000 PEN. The loan will be used to buy beer to sell it in their snack bar. As additional activity, Ramon also works as a laborer in a plantation, earning a monthly wage, a second income that helps him facing both his economic and domestic responsibilities.

loans.use: To buy beer for his snack bar.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “CRISTO ASENCION DE RUMICHACA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Juana se dedica al negocio de venta de chicha y cerveza,ella tiene una chicheria y tambien la socia se dedica al negocio de agricultura donde siembra maiz y hortalizas como zanahorias,lechugas y cebollas,la socia estas hortalizas y maiz lo vende en el mercado,el sueño de la socia es tener un puesto en el mercado donde pueda vender maiz y hortalizas.La socia solicita el credito para comprar chicha y cerveza y tambien para comprar fertilizantes y semillas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to “CRISTO ASENCION DE RUMICHACA” Communal Bank, which is located in Urubamba District, belonging to Urubamba Province in the department of Cusco.

Juana is dedicated to the business of selling “chicha” [a traditional beverage made from maize or fruit] and beer and has a “chichería” in her house. She also has a farming business where she plants maize and vegetables such as carrots, lettuce and onions. She sells these vegetables and maize in the market.

This member’s dream is to have a stall at the market where she can sell maize and vegetables. She is requesting a loan to purchase “chicha” and beer and also to buy fertilizers and seeds.

The member is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use:
.
to purchase chicha and beer and also to buy fertilizers and seeds.

loans.name: Yesica

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “CRISTO ASENCION DE RUMICHACA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Yesica se dedica al negocio de venta de jora que es un producto que se usa para preparar chcicha que es una bebida a base de maiz,la socia vende en forma ambulatoria desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,anteriormente la socia se dedica a vender chicha pero no le fue muy bien,la socia quiere ampliar y tener un local donde pueda vender la jora.La socia solicita el credito para comprar jora.

  La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to “CRISTO ASENCION DE RUMICHACA” Communal Bank, which is located in Urubamba District, belonging to Urubamba Province in the department of Cusco.

Yesica is dedicated to the business of selling “jora”, which is a product that is used to prepare “chicha”, which is a maize based drink. The member is a street vendor, selling from 8 a.m. until 6 p.m. Formerly she sold “chicha” but it did not go very well. The member wants to expand and have a space where she can sell “jora” and is requesting a loan to purchase “jora.”

This member is happy about the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase "jora".

loans.name: Emprendedoras De Villa Bonita Group

texts.es:
El comite es un grupo muy activo,  y apesar de tener algunos inconvenientes siempre supieron salir adelante , el grupo se encuentra en el ciclo seis y se esfuerzan por seguir creciendo y ayudarse.
Tomasa es la presidenta, ella se dedica a la confeccion de buzos y cuenta que siempre tiene mucho trabajo ya que muchos estudiantes van hasta ella para pedirle su trabajo. Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de telas, para que de esa forma siga ayudando a su familia y dándole lo que necesitan.
texts.en:
The communal bank is very active and despite having some problems they were always able to get ahead. The group is in their sixth loan cycle and they work hard to keep growing and helping each other.

Tomasa is the president; she makes sportswear and says that she always has a lot of work since many students go to her for her business. She needs the loan to buy fabrics; this will help her to keep supporting her family by providing them with what they need.

loans.use: buy fabrics to make sportswear.

loans.name: Vy´a Aty Group

texts.es:
El comité "Vy´a Aty"se originó a traves de promociones que se hicieron en el barrio.Todas las integrantes son de la misma zona, conocidas y vecinas del barrio.
La sra Celia, es Presidenta del grupo, ella Trabaja como empleada domestica por la mañana y por la tarde abre su salón de peluquería ubicado en su propia casa, ella es una persona muy emprendedora y con ganas de salir adelante y no teme al trabajo.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de shampoo, enjuagues, tintes, gel y demás insumos para poder seguir trabajando y cumpliendo con sus clientes.
texts.en:
The "Vy´a Aty" committee arose thanks to promotional events held in the neighborhood.  All the members are from the same zone; they know each other and are neighbors.

Celia is group President.  She works as a domestic employee mornings and in the afternoon opens her beauty salon located in her house.  She’s a very enterprising person who very much wants to get ahead and is not afraid of work.

She requests the loan to buy shampoo, rinse, hair color, gel and other supplies to continue working and satisfying her customers.

loans.use: to buy beauty salon supplies.

loans.name: Marlin Fatima

texts.es: Marlín es de la comarca La Concha, Boaco es casada tiene un hijo de 2 años su marido trabaja como guarda de seguridad en un aserrío cercano a la comarca. Ella dice que hace varios años inicio vendiendo helados y hielos los cuales lo hacía con fondos propios de ella. Hoy en día vende verduras y frutas como tomate, plátano guineo, mango lo cual lo realiza en su misma casa una vez que va a comprar a Managua. Marlín solicita este crédito para reforzar comprar frutas y verduras de la temporada. Ya que la venta esta buena y dice que el préstamo le será de ayuda ya que podrá reforzar el negocio  y al estar más llena la venta venderá mas y sacara mas ganancia además dice que una vez que pague este crédito l e gustaría ampliar mas su negocio y surtirlo de mas producto.
texts.en:
Marlín is from the region of La Concha, Boaco and she is married with a 2 year old child.  Her husband works as a security guard at a sawmill near the area.  She says that several years ago she started selling ice cream and popsicles, which she made with her own money.  Currently, she sells vegetables and fruit, such as tomatoes, bananas, and mangos, which she sells from her house after travelling to Managua to buy them.  

Marlín is asking for this loan to reinforce her money to buy seasonal fruits and vegetables.  Since her business is good, she says the loan will help to strengthen her business, and having more stock in her business, she will be able to sell more and make greater profits.  She says that she wants to expand her business and fill it will even more products once she pays off her loan.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Daniela

texts.es:
Daniela es soltera y no tiene hijos, vive en la casa de sus abuelos ocupando una habitación, la casa esta ubicada en la zona 8 de Diciembre en la ciudad de La Paz.
Ella estudio solo hasta terminar la secundaria y actualmente percibe ingresos ya que trabaja como empleada en una tienda de ropa por más de doce horas al día ya que debe ayudar en los gastos de alimentación y  pago de servicios básicos de sus abuelitos ya que son bastante mayores, es por eso que solicita el crédito ya que con lo poco que gana no le alcanza para la compra de mercadería ya que ella quiere independizarse en la venta de ropa para tener mejores ingresos.
El sueño de Daniela es adquirir una tienda propia para vender ropa  y tener mejores ingresos para poder pagar sus estudios ya que desea ser profesional.
Es la segunda vez que solicita crédito en IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Daniela is single and has no children.  She lives in her grandparents’ house occupying one room.  The house is located in the city of La Paz’s 8 de Diciembre zone.

She only completed secondary school and currently earns income working as an employee in a clothing store more than 12 hours daily since she must help cover food and basic utility costs for her grandparents who are quite elderly.  This is why she’s asking for the loan because the little she earns is insufficient to buy merchandise because she wants to become an independent clothes merchant in order to earn higher income.

Daniela’s dream is to acquire a store of her own to sell clothes in and to earn higher income in order to pay for her studies because she wants to become a professional.  This is the second time she’s asked for an IMPRO and KIVA loan.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.ru:
Светлана продолжает заниматься торговлей товарами для сельского хозяйства- семенами, удобрениями, химикатами. Ларек не большой, но товара в нем так же много. Товар  в ее магазине  продолжает пользоваться спросом в регионе  и поэтому  у Светланы остаются свои постоянные клиенты. В этом бизнесе она работает уже 15 лет. 

Светлана планирует вложить новый кредит от КИВА в 15 000 гривен в закупку товара для новой торговой точки: нужно закупить семена, химикаты. Теперь у нее достаточно хорошо развит бизнес, есть постоянный доход. У Светланы теперь две точки для торговли и доходы ее увеличатся.
texts.en: Svetlana continues to be involved in selling merchandise for agriculture, such as seeds, fertilizers and pesticides.  Her kiosk is small, but has a lot of merchandise.  The merchandise in her store remains in demand in the region, and this is why Svetlana retains her regular customers.  She has been working in this business for 15 years.  Svetlana plans to invest the new Kiva loan in the amount of 15,000 hryvnia into a purchase of merchandise for her new retail outlet.  She needs to buy seeds and pesticides.  Now that she has sufficiently developed her business, her income is stable.  Svetlana currently has two retail outlets, and her income will increase.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for her new retail outlet

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To expand his electronics repair business by buying more spare parts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to stock up on second hand inventory items.

loans.name: Carlos Antonio

texts.es:
El socio es el señor  Carlos, él pertenece al banco comunal “Tercer Milenio” de la Provincia de Urubamba del Cusco – Perú. El socio sigue dedicándose a la comercialización de materiales para la construcción, actividad que se ha venido incrementando los últimos años principalmente por el crecimiento del turismo en esta parte de la región, Carlos en esta oportunidad invertirá su préstamo para comprar arena, cemento, piedra y cascajo para cubrir la demanda que tiene.

El gran sueño de Carlos es hacer crecer a su empresa y comprar un volquete, el cual le ayudaría mucho en el transporte de los productos con los cuales comercia.

El socia Carlos agradece a  KIVA por permitirle desarrollarse con su actividad y seguir creciendo cada vez mas.
texts.en: Carlos is the associate and belongs to the communal bank "Tercer Milenio" or "3rd Millennium" from the Province of Urubamba of Cusco, Perú.  The associate continues selling materials for construction, an activity that has been growing in the past few years principally because of the growth of tourism in this part of the region.  Carlos, with this opportunity, will invest his loan in the purchase of sand, cement, rock and gravel in order to meet the demand.  Carlos's great dream is to grow his business and to purchase a dump truck, which would help him greatly with transporting the products that he sells.  Carlos thanks KIVA for helping him to develop his business and to continue growing each time a bit more.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials including sand, cement, gravel, and other items.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “INTI QUILLA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia continua con su negocio de venta de artesanía ,la socia vende su mercaderia en un stand por el centro de la ciudad,la socia vende lo que son chompas,polos,chuyos,guantes entre otros,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le trae satisfaciones tanto economicas como personales ya que mediante este negocio la socia puede conocer a personas de distintas nacionalidades,siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia. 

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de chompas de alpaca.
                                                                                                                                                                           
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the comunal bank "Inti Quilla." The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco in the region of Cusco. 

The member continues with her business selling crafts. The member sells her merchandise in a stand in the center of the city. She sells sweaters, polos, hats and gloves, among other items. The member dedicates significant time to this business, which brings her as much personal satisfaction as economic satisfaction because through this business she gets to know people from many nationalities and this is the way that she gets her family ahead. 

The member seeks this loan to buy sweaters made from alpaca.

The member is happy because of the loan and she promises to comply with the payments for her portion.

loans.use: to buy sweaters made from alpaca.

loans.name: Eufemia

texts.es:
La señora Eufemia tiene 51 años de edad, es casada y fruto de esta relación tiene dos hijos, ella nació y vive en la ciudad de Oropesa a 30 minutos de la ciudad del Cusco. Su actividad económica  de la socia es la elaboración de pan  de “oropesa”. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. 

La señora Eufemia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que le invitaron a participar del banco Comunal “Virgen Asunta de Oropesa” de la Asociación Arariwa. En esta oportunidad la señora Eufemia requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo harina, azucar y otras cosas mas.  

La señora Eufemia agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Eufemia, 51, is married and has two children from that relationship. She was born and lives in the city of Oropesa, 30 minutes from the city of Cusco. Her business is making Oropesa bread, which she has been doing for some years. It is going well. 

Eufemia is an entrepreneurial and hardworking woman who was invited to participate in the village bank "Virgen Asunta de Oropesa", part of the Arariwa Association. On this occasion, Eufemia needs a loan to buy ingredients like flour, sugar and other things.

Eufemia is grateful for the loan and promises to make her payments according to the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to purchase flour and sugar

loans.name: Violeta

texts.es:
La socia Violeta continua con su negocio de venta de ropa ,la socia vende a sus clientes que mas le solicitan son como amistades y familiares ,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le trae satisfaciones tanto economicas como personales,siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia,la socia vende lo que son pantalones,blusas,casacas entre otros,la socia es una persona responsable con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su fmailia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de mercaderia como casacas. La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas estbalecidas.
texts.en:
Violeta is still working in her clothes selling business, she is a street vendor and sells to the customers who ask for it the most like friends and family, she has been in this business for quite a while and it brings her both economical and personal satisfaction. This is the way she supports her family.
Violeta sells trousers, blouses, jackets and other items.
She is a very responsible person and very willing to keep working for her family.
She requests this loan to buy merchandise like dress coats.
Violeta is really grateful for the loan that has been given to her and she makes herself responsible to pay for her installments on time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, like dress coats.

loans.name: Juana Nilda

texts.es:
La señora Juana tiene 45 años de edad, es viuda de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella nació y vive en la ciudad de Oropesa a 30 minutos de la ciudad del Cusco. La socia Juana es la profesora y  ya son varios años que se dedica a enseñar y le va muy bien.   

La señora Juana es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que le invitaron a participar del banco Comunal “Virgen Asunta de Oropesa” de la Asociación Arariwa. En esta oportunidad la señora Juana requiere el préstamo para uso personal es para educación de su hijo. 

La señora Juana agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Juana, 45, is a widow; she has two children.  She was born in and still lives in the city of Oropesa thirty minutes from the city of Cusco.  Juana is a teacher and has been teaching for several years; she does very well.

Juana is an enterprising, hardworking woman who was invited to participate in Asociación Arariwa’s “Virgen Asunta de Oropesa” communal bank.  On this occasion Juana needs a personal use loan for her son’s education.

Juan is grateful for the loan and commits to make her installment payments as scheduled.

loans.use: to pay for her son's schooling.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John runs a restaurant business in Nyahururu town and has been in the business for the past five years.  He is 49 years-old and married to Jane.

Having paid his first loan amount well and in good time, this will be his second loan with which he plans to buy more stock of maize and wheat flour, cooking oil, rice, beans and sugar to use in his business.

In the future, John plans to expand his  business and attract more customers in order to make more income.

loans.use: to buy more stock of maize and wheat flour,cooking oil, rice, beans and sugar to use in his business.

loans.name: Eulalia

texts.es:
La socia  es la señora  Eulalia, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Virgen Asunta de Racsa” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. La socia  está casada y tiene 3 hijos, dos en edad escolar y el mayor en la los primeros años de la universidad,  Eulalia se dedica al comercio de papas al por mayor, trabajo que viene realizando hace muchos años,  Eulalia realiza este sacrificado  trabajo durante todo el día, desde muy temprano en la madrugada al momento de recibir la mercadería de los productores, hasta horas de la noche que termina el movimiento comercial en su centro de abastos. Eulalia nos comenta que este sacrificio es por su familia, para ofrecerle mejor educación a sus hijos, inversión que ella considera que es  lo más importante, y algún día no muy lejano poder sacarlos profesionales a todos, y trabajen en un trabajo menos duro físicamente.

La socia Eulalia en esta oportunidad invertirá su préstamo para capitalizar su actividad y comprará diferentes especies de papas al por mayor, para cubrir su mercado y demanda, los cuales son otros pequeños mercados, súper mercados, hoteles y restaurantes.

La socia Eulalia está muy agradecida con KIVA por permitirle mantenerse con su actividad, llevar el sustento a su casa y proporcionarles una mejor educación a sus hijos que es el gran sueño de Eulalia, sacarlos profesionales a todos.
texts.en:
Eulalia belongs to the “Virgen Asunta de Racsa” communal bank in the city of Cusco, Perú.  She’s married and has three children two of which are school age.  The oldest is in the first years of university.  

Eulalia is a wholesale potato merchant, work she’s been doing for many years.  Eulalia carries out this demanding work all day from very early in the dawn hours when she receives her merchandise from producers until late at night when commercial activity at the wholesale market ends.  Eulalia comments that this sacrifice is for her family, to offer her children a better education which is an investment she considers to be of utmost importance and to some day in the not too distant future to see them all become professionals working in less physically demanding jobs.

On this occasion, she will use the loan to capitalize her business buying different species of potatoes at wholesale to cover market and customer demand.  Her main customers are other small stores, supermarkets, hotels and restaurants.

Eulalia is very grateful to KIVA for allowing her to stay in business and provide sustenance for her home and to provide a good education for her children which is Eulalia’s greatest dream: that they all become professionals.

loans.use: to buy various kinds of potatoes at wholesale.

loans.name: Creespine

texts.en:
Creespine a 41 year-old man from Nakuru.  He is married with three children who are aged between 18 years and three years old.

Creespine has a general shop which he has been running for the past six months.  He has applied for his first loan from Kiva partner KADET LTD in order to enable him to buy maize meal, sugar, rice etc to add to his stock.

He hopes to build rental houses in the near future.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, maize meal, sugar and rice.

loans.name: Silvia María

texts.es:
El Sauce es un municipio que pertenece al departamento de León, en él habita Silvia María, es una profesora con muchos años de experiencia, de las muchas que hay en dicho municipio con una profesión  merecedora y motivante porque gracias a estas personas hoy se han forjado grandes profesionales que son el desarrollo de nuestro país.
Está solicitando un crédito para pagar los gastos universitarios de su hija menor, ya que su mayor sueño es verla preparada profesionalmente y no quiere que en un futuro esto sea un obstáculo para culminar su carrera de Trabajo Social.
Está muy agradecida con KIVA y Ceprodel por este período que tiene de trabajar con ellos y que le han brindado su mano amiga con el apoyo de estos créditos que aseguran el futuro de las personas que más lo necesitan.
texts.en:
El Sauce is a town belonging to León Department.  Silvia María lives there.  She’s a teacher with many years’ experience like many in said town who carry out a deserving, motivating profession because thanks to such people great professionals who are developing Nicaragua are formed.

She’s asking for a loan to pay her younger daughter’s university costs because her greatest dream is to see her become a professional so that in future it won’t be an obstacle for he to complete her career in social work.

She’s very grateful to KIVA and Ceprodel for the time she’s been working with them and they’ve extended a friendly hand supporting her with loans that insure the future for people who most need it.

loans.use: to pay university expenses.

loans.name: Sergey

texts.ru:
Сергей фермер  с 1997 года. 
Его деятельность  в сельском хозяйстве  начиналась с выращивания овощей в теплице  на приусадебном участке  размером 10 сот.  и посевов зерновых культур на арендованных землях 10га.
Для облегчения труда Сергей решил приобрести мотоблок, окучник грядок и косилку для скашивания сорной травы.  Мотоблок также позволит быстро и качественно обработать  земельную площадь на приусадебном участке, который расширился до 25 сот.
В планах на будущее -   выращивать виноград в теплице.
В личных планах – построить новый дом.
Уникальное качество Сергея - это заработать на жизнь честным трудом .
texts.en: Sergey has been a farmer since 1997.  His agricultural business started with growing vegetables in a greenhouse on his 10 sotkas land plot by his house and sowing cereal crops on 10 hectares of leased land.  To ease his work, Sergey decided to purchase mechanized farming equipment, a furrower and a mower for cutting weeds.  This equipment will also allow to quickly and with quality treat the soil on the land plot by his house, which expanded to 25 sotkas.  Sergey's future plans include growing grapes in a greenhouse, and his personal plans include building a new house.  Sergey's unique quality is earning a living through honest work.

loans.use: to purchase mechanized farming equipment

loans.name: Claudia Marcela

texts.es:
Claudia,  tiene la edad de 26 años, casada, su núcleo familiar compuesto por tres su hija y esposo, reside en el departamento de Masaya ciudad de las Flores, comerciante, tiene de experiencia en el ramo 7 años, comenta que ella comenzó su negocio con capital propio, pero a medida que pasa el tiempo va engrandeciendo su fuente de trabajo por lo que necesita comprar la siguiente mercadería quintales de arroz faisán, arroz maría, de azúcar, galón de aceite, café presto, café toro, avena, jabón marfil, jabón extra, coca cola, queso, cloro, etc. Y poder reabastecer de más productos su pulpería. Gracias al apoyo que ha tenido junto con su esposo ya que el tiene un taller de zapatería entre los dos han podido salir adelante.
Se presenta a nuestra oficina Ceprodel para solicitar un financiamiento, en el que pueda  seguir cumpliendo  con la demanda que esta teniendo, de igual manera mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Claudia is 26 years old, is married and her family is made up of three people with her daughter and husband, they live in the department of Masaya, city of las Flores. She is a salesperson and has over 7 years of experience in her field and says that she began her business with her own capital but as time goes on her work keeps growing and needs the buy the following merchandize in 100 pounds, Faisán rice, María rice, and sugar, a gallon of oil, Presto coffee, Toro coffee, oatmeal, Marfil soap, Extra soap, Coca-Cola, cheese, bleach, etc. to be able to stock her small grocery store with more products. Thanks to the support that she has received along with her husband, he has a shoemaker’s shop; they have been able to get ahead.

Claudia went to our office, Ceprodel, to seek a loan so that she can keep meeting the demand that she has, and to improve the quality of life of her family.

loans.use: buy the following merchandize in 100 pounds, Faisán rice, María rice, and sugar, a gallon of oil, Presto coffee, Toro coffee, oatmeal, Marfil soap, Extra soap, Coca-Cola, cheese, bleach, etc.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose owns a grocery stall as a primary business and at the same time runs a carpentry workshop, the business is doing well.

She has requested for a fourth loan of  KES.100,000 after successfully servicing her previous loan well, she will use the loan to purchase timber, steel metals, foam, furnishing paints and glasses for use in the  workshop.  

Her profits will help her open another branch of this business. Her dream is to become successful business woman.

loans.use: to purchase timber, steel metals, foam, furnishing paints and glass.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María es de la comarca Llano Grande, Boaco 34 años de edad, se dedica a la crianza de ganado, actividad que muy poco realiza las mujeres de su comunidad.  María dice que el ganado que hoy tiene lo obtuvo de ingresos que ganaba en un centro de salud de la comarca donde laboraba como auxiliar de enfermería aunque también ella dice que hace mucho un tío le regalo una ternera la cual se fue aumentando.  María nos cuenta del ganado que tiene 4 vacas están paridas las que ordeña y hace cuajada para vender  en la comarca.   
María ha trabajado por varios periodos con MiCredito  y hoy necesita este crédito Kiva para comprar unos terneros engordarlos y venderlos a mejor precio, este crédito la ayudara ya que comprara varios terneros que engorden los venderá a mejor precio y tendrá mejor ganancia. Ella dice que una vez que pague el crédito con la venta del ganado financiado sacara un nuevo crédito  siempre para aumentar invertir más en la crianza de  ganado de raza. Esto le abrirá puertas en el negocio de crianza de ganado.
texts.en:
María is from the region of Llano Grande, Boaco and is 34 years old.  She raises cattle, an activity which is uncommon among women in her region. María says that the cattle she now has, she bought with income from her work in a health center in the region, where she worked as a clinical assistant, though she also notes that a long time ago her uncle gave her some land, which she has been adding to.  María tells us that of the cattle she has, 4 cows recently gave birth, and these are milked and fattened up to sell at the market.   

María has worked at different times with MiCredito and she now needs a loan from Kiva to buy some land on which to fatten and sell her cattle at a better prices.  This credit will help her, since once she has bought land and fattened the cows, she will be able to sell them at a price that earns her more profits.

She says that once she has paid off her loan, with the sales of the cattle, she will get a new loan and continue to invest in more cattle ranching.  This will open more doors to her in her ranching business.

loans.use: to buy some land.

loans.name: María Benita

texts.es:
María Benita es una madre soltera de 44 años, vive en el municipio de El Sauce, departamento de León, en sus ratos libres le gusta leer para aprender un poco sobre lo relacionado a Administración, por cosas de la vida fue madre de su primer hijo a temprana edad y por falta de recursos económicos no pudo cursar una carrera universitaria, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder estudiar la carrera de Administración de Empresas.

Gracias a su espíritu emprendedor y a sus ganas de salir adelante y de darles lo mejor que puede a sus dos hijos, María Benita se dedica a laborar como conserje con muchos años de experiencia, se encuentra muy a gusto con su trabajo y aunque su salario es un poco bajo le permite llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar y dotar de lo que puede a sus hijos.
Está solicitando un crédito para gastos escolares, ya que se acercan las fiestas patrias de nuestro País donde tiene que adquirir uniformes y zapatos escolares para sus dos hijos, ya que todos los estudiantes tienen que participar en dicha actividad.

Uno de sus mayores sueños es preparar a sus hijos profesionalmente y que sean hombres de bien, que aunque ella no pudo tener una profesión quiere luchar para que sus hijos si lo sean y tengan un mejor futuro.

Se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva y Ceprodel, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar estos gastos, ya que sin este apoyo no se realizaran muchos sueños y metas.
texts.en:
María Benita, 44, is a single mother living in the town of El Sauce, León Department.  In her free time she likes to read to learn a bit related to administration.  Due to life’s foibles she became a mother at a young age and due to lack of economic resources was unable to study a university career but would have like to have studied Business Administration.

Thanks to her enterprising spirit and her will to get ahead and give the best she can to her two children, María Benita works as a caretaker; she has many years of experience.  She’s very happy with her work and although her salary is a bit low it does allow her to provide daily bread for her home and provide what she can for her children.

She’s asking for a loan to pay school expenses because Nicaragua’s national feast days are approaching and she has to buy school uniforms and shoes for her two children because all the students must participate in such activity.

One of her greatest dreams is to prepare her children professionally so that they will become upstanding citizens.  Even though she was unable to have a profession she wants to strive so that her children will and thus have a better future.

She is very grateful to Kiva lenders and to Ceprodel because thanks to the support provided she will be able to cover these costs; without this support many dreams and goals would remain unmet.

loans.use: to pay school costs.

loans.name: Félix Noel

texts.es:
El municipio de El Sauce se caracteriza por ser un bello pueblo lleno de paisajes hermosos, con un sinnúmeros de pobladores trabajadores y responsables, como es el caso de Félix Noel, el cual es un joven que nació en dicho municipio y fue criado con buenos principios morales y religiosos que se gana la vida desde muy pequeño.
Inició su negocio hace 16 años, el cual consiste en brindar el servicio de transporte a través de un tricitaxis a los pobladores de dicho municipio y sus visitantes. El Tricitaxis consiste en una bicicleta que lleva por la parte delantera un asiento para transportar a dos personas como máximo.
Gracias este negocio hoy tiene su propia vivienda donde habita con su esposa e hija, el que le permite llevar a diario el sustento a su hogar.
Está solicitando este crédito para gastos médicos de su pequeña hija y con la gracias de Dios mejorar la salud para que tenga una infancia feliz.
Agradece a KIVA y Ceprodel por el apoyo con estos pequeños créditos que ayudan a mejorar las condiciones de vida de muchas familias de escasos recursos y que sin ello no se pudieran cumplir muchos sueños.
texts.en:
The town of El Sauce is noted for being a beautiful town full of beautiful scenery with an infinite number of hardworking, responsible residents.  This is the case of Félix Noel who is a young man born in said town and raised with good moral and religious principles who has been earning his livelihood since he was very little.

He started his business that consists in providing transportation services with a tricitaxi 16 years ago.  A tricitaxi is a bicycle that has a seat attached to the front to transport up to two people maximum.

Thanks to this business he owns his house where he lives with his wife and daughter and he’s able to provide daily sustenance for his home.

Félix is requesting this loan to pay medical expenses for his little girl whose health with the help of God will improve so that she’ll have a happy infancy.

He thanks KIVA and Ceprodel for the support these small loans give because they help to improve the living conditions of many families of scarce resources who without them would be unable to reach many of their dreams.

loans.use: to pay medical expenses.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy, a 42-year-old farmer in Olakau town, plants cash crops such as maize, beans and potatoes to sell, and it is a profitable business. She is married to Moses and they have three children.

This will be Nancy's first loan, with which she plans to buy fertilizer and seeds for planting during this planting season. Because of the favorable weather, she anticipates having a better harvest than in previous seasons and making more income with which she will pay school fees for her children.

In the future, Nancy plans to buy another piece of land to expand her farming, which will allow her to increase her income and improve the living standards of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds for planting.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy oranges and three bags of potatoes.

loans.name: Emerance

texts.en:
Emerance, a 46-year-old married mother of six children between 7 and 20 years of age, purchases and sells various goods such as African clothes, books, etc. She has been in this business for one year, working from 7 a.m. to 7 p.m. every weekday.

Emerance has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to buy more African clothes, books, etc. for resale. With the profits, she will be able to save for her future and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to buy various goods such as African clothes, books, etc. for resale.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.en:
Antonio is an artisan who carries on his family's woodcraft, creating jewelry boxes, mirrors and home décor items. He would like a 1200 USD loan to purchase additional wood and carpentry tools. He would also like to be able to invite other artisans to assist him in his workshop.

Antonio has been selling through NOVICA since 2005. This is his story:

"I'd describe my work as life itself, and my existence together with it. When I was only 17, I created my first piece, and it was immensely satisfying. Art guides my hands in that moment of pleasure when I begin a design.

“My pieces are inspired by the olden times and reflect the style of vintage pieces. They transmit my love for life and for nature, and all the rich flora and fauna of our country.

"I appreciate the opportunity to expand my work with this interest-free microcredit loan. Each piece I make is created with total dedication and is designed to bring you comfort and beauty. Thank you!"

Use the following link to view Antonio's wood creations on the NOVICA site: http://www.novica.com/artistdetail/index.cfm?faid=5387

loans.use: to purchase additional wood and carpentry tools.

loans.name: Arian

texts.en:
Arian is twenty years old and single. He lives in Kosovo with his entire family in a small village. To earn a living and help his family, he works in construction.

Arian’s family has had a longstanding problem with its toilet. For a long time they have also had a problem with their water heater and other basic things. The money he generates through his work is not enough to pay for repairing the toilet.

Arian is requesting a 1000 EUR loan from KosInvest to buy a water heater and spare parts for the toilet. He and his family thank KosInvest lenders for their help and for helping them improve the family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a water heater and spare parts for the toilet.

loans.name: Manuela Del Carmen

texts.es:
Doña Manuela, reside en Nindirí municipio del departamento de Masaya, casada, tiene la edad de 48 años, ella es comerciante desde hace 7 años, su negocio consiste en ofrecer el servicio de alquiler de silla, para eventos sociales  entre los que podemos mencionar   matrimonios, bautizos, cumpleaños, entre otros. Este lo tiene ubicado en su vivienda que es donde sus clientes le llegan a solicitar el servicio, no tiene competencia, cuenta que este negocio le ha dado buenos resultados, ahí todos la conocen por la actividad a la que se dedica, la conocen como una señora humilde y trabajadora,  y sus clientes le son fieles a ella.  
Debido a que con el tiempo algunas de sus herramientas de trabajo (sillas, mesas) se deterioran tiene que reponerlas para poder ofrecer siempre un mejor servicio por lo que se presenta a nuestra oficina para requerir de  un préstamo que le permita comprar las sillas que esta necesitando. Y de esta manera poder seguir dando un mejor servicio de calidad a la comunidad.
texts.en:
Manuela lives in Nindirí, a city within the Masaya department.  She’s 48 years old, married and has been a merchant for seven years.  Her business consists of her renting out chairs for social events, such as weddings, baptisms, and birthdays, among others.   This business is located in her home, where her customers go to request her services.  She doesn’t have any competition and she has gotten good results from this business.  Everyone knows her through her business and knows her to be friendly, honest, and hardworking.  Her customers are loyal to her.

Because some of her tools of the trade (tables, chairs) have deteriorated, she needs to replace them so that she can always provide the best service, so she has come to our office to request a loan so that she can buy the chairs she needs.  This will allow her to continue providing quality service to her community.

loans.use: Para la compra de sillas plásticas (alquiler)

loans.name: Aracely Del Carmen

texts.es: Aracely, es originaria  de la ciudad de Esteli, madre de tres hijos de 16,14 y 10 años de edad todos ellos estan estudiando, casada, de oficio comerciante se dedica a la venta de ropa usada, tiene una pequeña tienda en su casa de habitación. Empezo su negocio  con capital propio y además de los ingresos que le genera la venta de productos lacteos , el cual fue su primer negocio ahora solo se dedica  a la venta de ropa, negocio en el cual la apoya su esposo , ambos trabajan en conjunto para sacar adelante a su familia. Ella va utilizar el  crédito para comprar ropa, zapato, cubrecamas. Pues son parte de la mercadería que vende y necesita surtir su tienda para poder vender. Dentro de sus planes esta ampliar mas su tienda  agregando ropa de nuevos estilos y medidas, vender electrodomésticos, utensilios de cocina. Su meta es lograr preparar a sus hijos profesionalmente.
texts.en: Aracely is from the city of Esteli.  She’s the mother of three children, ages 16, 14, and 10, all of whom attend school.  She’s married and is a merchant by trade, selling second hand clothing from a small store set up in her home.  She started this business with her own money and aside from this business she also generated income by selling milk products, which was her first business.  Now she only sells clothing with her husband’s help.  They work together to get their family ahead.  She will use the money from this loan to buy clothing, shoes, and bedspreads.  This is the type of merchandise she sells and she needs to stock her store.  Her plans include expanding her store and adding new styles and sizes of clothing, selling appliances, and kitchen utensils.  Her goal is to prepare her children to become professionals.

loans.use: to buy inventory

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan, de oficio agricultor, habitante de Estelí, siembra tabaco y hortalizas, gracias a su gran esfuerzo , ardua labor y responsabilidad goza de un buen record creditico en MiCredito, el préstamo Kiva lo ha ayudado en su proceso de crecimiento como agricultor . El está requiriendo el crédito para sembrar  frijol y maíz pues el siguiente ciclo de siembra de granos básico esta cerca y desea no perder la oportunidad de sembrar pues son ingresos que necesita para salir adelante y prosperar en la vida.
texts.en: Juan, a farmer, is a resident of Estelí. He grows tobacco and vegetables. Thanks to his great effort, arduous labor, and responsibility, he enjoys a good credit history with MiCredito. The Kiva loan has helped him in his process of growing as a farmer. He needs the loan in order to plant beans and corn. The next planting cycle for beans and grains is close, and he doesn't want to miss the chance to plant since they provide the income he needs in order to move ahead and prosper in life.

loans.use: to plant beans and corn

loans.name: Santos Ester
