texts.es: Santos, originaria de la comunidad Rio Grande-Pueblo Nuevo, obtuvo su primer crédito atravez de Kiva, el cual le dio la oportunidad de sembrar dos manzanas de frijoles cosecha que fue muy buena para ella está muy agradecida por la confianza y el apoyo recibido. Ahora quiere iniciar un nuevo ciclo de siembra y está requiriendo este crédito para sembrar 1/2 de chiltomas, pues requiere comprar insumos, pagar mano de obra y fertilizantes. Espera sacar una producción de muy calidad y alto rendimiento.
texts.en:
Santos is from the community of Rio Grande-Pueblo Nuevo. She received a previous loan from Kiva, which she put towards planting roughly four acres of beans. She had a good harvest, and is grateful for the confidence and support she received. 

Presently, she wants to begin a new planting cycle, and plans to use the support from this loan to plant an acre of beans, purchase input items and fertilizers, and hire workers to help with planting and harvesting. She hopes to have a high quality and high yield harvest.

loans.use: to plant bean crops.

loans.name: Ol'ga

texts.ru:
Ольга – женщина фермер. С  1995 года занимается выращиванием винограда, клубники, малины и зерновых культур. По хозяйству  ей помогают двое ее детей.  Старшему сыну  37 лет,  младшему 20 лет, они  работают в автосервисе.
Свою деятельность как фермер, Ольга начинала на 10 сотках земельного пая. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Ольги 5 гектар  земли.
Для повышения урожая  клубники решено было приобрести пленку для мини теплицы. Мотокоса нужна для борьбы с сорняками.
В хозяйственных планах Ольги- расширить посадку клубники  на 6 га., поставить теплицу на 400м2.
Личные планы – покупка  нового автомобиля для транспортировки собранного урожая  на рынки.
texts.en: Olga is a woman farmer.  She has been involved in growing grapes, strawberries, raspberries and cereal crops since 1995.  Two of her children help her with the business.  The oldest son is 37 years old, and the youngest is 20 years old, and both of them work at an auto service shop.  Olga started her farming business with 10 sotkas of family land share.  Today, her farm consists of five hectares of land.  She decided to purchase plastic for a mini greenhouse in order to increase the strawberry harvest.  She also needs to purchase a mower to combat weeds.  Olga's business plans are to expand the sowing of strawberries to six hectares and install a greenhouse on 400 square meters.  Her personal plans are to purchase a new car to transport her harvest to markets.

loans.use: to purchase farming equipment

loans.name: Olinda

texts.es:
Olinda, se dedica a la venta de medicina de forma ambulante con su familia y es madre de cuatro jóvenes, la vivienda es propia, tiene dos años que está realizando la venta de medicamentos, éste surgió por la necesidad de tener un negocio para poder ayudar con los gastos familiares, sus hijos le apoya a vender.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de medicamentos naturales y también vitaminas, por ejemplo se puede mencionar calcio, rábano llodado, hígado crudo, entre otros medicamentos que están elaborados a base natural, esto le ayudará a invertir en el desarrollo del negocio, incrementando su inventario y pudiendo mejora el servicio a los clientes.

Su aspiración es tener prosperidad en el negocio, mejorando su situación económica en la familia ya que esto le permitirá ofrecer una mejor condición de vida a sus parientes.
texts.en:
Olinda sells medicine door-to-door with her family. She is the mother of four children, and her house belongs to her. She has been selling medicine for two years. She started due to the need to have a business to be able to help with the household expenses. Her children help her to sell.

She is asking for a loan to buy natural medicines as well as vitamins, for example calcium, rábano yodado (iodized radish), and raw liver, among other medicines prepared on a natural basis. This will help her to invest in the development of her business, increasing her inventory and enabling her to improve her customer service. 

Her aspiration is to have a prosperous business, improving her family's financial situation, since this will allow her to offer her relatives better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase medicines: calcium, rábano yodado (iodized radish), and raw liver

loans.name: Sandra Yanira

texts.es:
Sandra, está solicitando un préstamo para poder realizar la compra de cerdos para la granja, esta inversión ayudará a que su negocio se mantenga, y su ocupación en la atención de la granja también le permita generar mejores utilidades para su familia.

Manifiesta que los préstamos obtenidos a través de la institución le han permitido mejorar su situación económica, invirtiendo en el negocio y ganando más clientes, hasta el momento ha logrado generar una condición de vida más estable en su núcleo familiar.
texts.en:
Sandra is requesting this loan in order to purchase pigs for her farm. This investment will help her sustain her business and hopefully lead to increased profits and a better quality of life for her family.

Her previous loans have helped her improve her financial condition, invest in her business, expand her customer base and create a stable situation for her immedaite family.

loans.use: to purchase pigs for her farm.

loans.name: Anara

texts.ru:
Анаре 33 года, замужем, имеет 3 детей, младшему из которых 4 года. Анара в качестве основного источника дохода для своей семьи, на протяжении 12 лет занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 3,000 сом. Благодаря упорному труду Анары в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется 1 корова с приплодом, 1 рабочая лошадь, 10 овец, продажа молока приносит около 2,000 сом в месяц. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Анара обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 35,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дополнительного скота для отправки на летнее пастбище.  Доходы от кредита Анара будет вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие бизнеса за счет постройки сарая.
texts.en: Anara is 33 years old, married and has three children, the youngest of whom is four years old.  To provide the primary source of income for her family, she has been involved in animal husbandry for 12 years, having started this business with a sum of 3,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to Anara's hard work, today her business contains a dairy cow with offspring, one work horse and ten sheep, and the sales of milk yield about 2,000 som per month.  In order to further develop her business, Anara requested a loan in the amount of 35,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy additional livestock to send to a summer pasture.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a continued development of her business by building a barn.

loans.use: to additional livestock

loans.name: Aida

texts.ru: Аиде 38 лет, замужем, имеет 2 сыновей. В поисках источника дохода для своей семьи,  Аида месяц назад начала свой бизнес в торговле продуктами питания со стартовой суммой в 20,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря настойчивости,  Аида сумела увеличить товарооборот, получив прибыль за месяц в сумме 18,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день ассортимент товаров не представлен в изобилии, и по этой причине Аида  обратилась  в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 55,000 сом (KGS)на закуп растительного масла, макаронных и хлебных изделий, напитков и мороженого.  Доходы от кредита Аида  планирует вложить в развитие бизнеса.
texts.en: Aida is 38 years old, married and has two sons.  In search of a source of income for her family, she started her own business of selling food products two months ago with an initial sum of 20,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to Aida's persistence, she was able to increase her product turnover by earning a profit of 18,000 som (KGS).  Today the product selection is limited, and this is why Aida requested a loan in the amount of 55,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy vegetable oil, pasta and baked goods, beverages and ice-cream.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a continued development of her business.

loans.use: to buy vegetable oil, pasta and baked goods, beverages and ice-cream

loans.name: Maria Juana

texts.es:
María, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para poder invertir en el negocio, está motivada pues considera que través de estos financiamientos han logrado permanecer con un buen servicio a sus clientes, en esta ocasión comprara productos como arroz, aceite, frijoles, lácteos, entre otros productos que le permiten ofrecer a su clientela.
Considera que el préstamo anterior le permitió crecer y tener más surtido el negocio, logrando mejorar las condiciones familiares y también incrementando sus ganancias.
texts.en:
María is asking for a new loan in order to be able to invest in her business. She is motivated to do this because she thinks that through these loans she has succeeded in maintaining good service for her customers. This time she will buy products such as rice, oil, beans, and milk products, among other items the loans permit her to offer to her customers.

She thinks that the previous loan allowed her to grow and to keep her business better stocked. She was able to improve her family's conditions and also increased her earnings.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as rice, oil, beans, and milk products

loans.name: Shaarkan

texts.ru: Шааркан 51 год, замужем, имеет 1 сына. В 1992 году, в поисках источника дохода для своей семьи, Шааркан начала свой бизнес в животноводстве со стартовой суммы в 5,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорству и настойчивости, на сегодняшний день,  ее хозяйство насчитывает 3 дойные коровы,  15 овец, 5 кобыл, 15 коз, ежемесячная прибыль составляет около 7,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных и мясных продуктов. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Шааркан обратилась в компанию «Бай-Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 20,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов мелкого рогатого скота. В будущем, Шааркан хочет увеличить хозяйство и расширить свой бизнес.
texts.en: Shaarkan is 51 years old, married and has one son.  In search of a source of income for her family, she started her own business in animal husbandry in 1992 with an initial sum of 5,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to her persistence, today her business contains three dairy cows, fifteen sheep, five horses and fifteen goats, and the monthly profit from sales of milk and meat products amount to about 7,000 som (KGS) per month.  In order to further develop her business, Shaarkan requested a loan in the amount of 20,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy additional small livestock.  In the future, she wants to increase her farm and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Pedro William

texts.es:
Pedro, solicita un préstamo, pues considera necesaria una nueva inversión para poder abastecer el negocio de prendas de vestir con estilo nuevo, blusas y faldas, ropa interior, ya que esta inversión le permitirá continuar ofreciendo a los clientes variedad de mercadería.

Manifiesta que el préstamo anterior le permitió crecer, teniendo un mejor surtido en ropa para diferentes edades, esto le ocasionó mejoras en el número de clientes atendidos, hasta el momento considera que sus ingresos han sido mejores.
texts.en:
Pedro is requesting this loan in order to stock his clothing apparel business with stylish products. He plans to purchase blouses, skirts, underwear and other clothing items in hopes of offering his customers a wide variety of merchandise.

His previous loan helped him to expand his business and offer a greater variety of clothing for people of various ages. He has been expanding his customer base and increasing the number of clients he can attend to in a given day. Though sales could be better, he is doing well with his business.

loans.use: to purchase blouses, skirts, underwear and other clothing items for resale.

loans.name: Sonia Olandina

texts.es:
Sonia, tiene 36 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 4 hijos, y reside en el municipio de San Pedro Sula, Cortes.
Doña Sonia, realiza dos actividades de negocio elabora y vende tortillas de maíz negocio de varios años y tiene una pulpería donde vende productos de la canasta básica como arroz, frijoles, manteca, huevos, azúcar, pan, especies, refrescos churros etc.la pulpería la estableció hace un año. El préstamo que solicita es por 7,000 Lempiras y lo va invertir en compra de productos para surtir la pulpería como granos básicos, manteca, refrescos, churros. Con esta inversión ella quiere hacer crecer el negocio que se mantenga surtido.  Su plan es seguir apoyando a sus hijos en el estudio.
texts.en:
Sonia, 36, is a single mother; she has four children and lives in the municipality of San Pedro Sula, Cortes.  Sonia carries out two businesses: she’s been making and selling corn tortillas for several years and also has a grocery store where she sells basic staples like rice, beans, lard, eggs, sugar, bread, spices, soft-drinks, snacks, etc.  She opened the grocery store a year ago.  

She’s asking for a 7,000 lempira loan to buy products to stock the grocery store like basic grains, lard, soft-drinks and snacks.  With this investment she wants to make the business grow and keep it well stocked.  Her plan is to continue supporting her children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Rodolfo

texts.es:
Rodolfo, solicita un préstamo para poder continuar fortaleciendo el negocio, ya que sigue dedicado a la venta de ropa y productos plásticos, con los fondos prestados realizará la inversión en variedad de ropa, blusas, ropa interior, también se comprarán productos plásticos como valdes, utensilios de cocina, esta inversión en el negocio le ayudara a mantener un buen nivel en el negocio.

El efecto que tuvo con el préstamo anterior le ayuda a fortalecer el negocio, cubriendo la compra de mercadería, con sus ganancias obtenidas ha podido invertirlas en algunas necesidades de la familia y en el mismo negocio.
texts.en:
Rodolfo is requesting this loan in order to strengthen and further stock his clothing and plastic products sales business. With the support from this loan, he plans to purchase clothing such as blouses and underwear, and plastic products such as kitchen utensils, chairs, etc. He hopes that this investment will help him to sustain and reinforce his business.

His previous loan helped him to strengthen his business and cover the cost of purchasing merchandise for resale. He has been able to invest his profits and earnings in things his family needs, as well as in the needs of his business.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, blouses, underwear and plastic products for resale.

loans.name: Jose Mateo

texts.es:
Jose Mateo, tiene 30 años de edad, vive en el Municipio de Morazan Yoro, junto a su conyugue y sus 3 hijas.
 El siempre a realizado actividades agrícolas desde niño aprendió con su padre, ahora tiene 15 años de dedicarse a su propio cultivo de granos básicos. Produce maíz y frijoles y los vende en el mercado local. Solicita este préstamo de 4,000 lempiras para comprar fertilizantes, abonos y pago por mantenimiento del cultivo de maíz y frijoles, con esta inversión el espera sacar buenas cosechas con productos de mejorar calidad. Su plan es mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y siempre obtener los ingresos para el sustento diario familiar.
texts.en:
José Mateo, 30, lives in the municipality of Morazán, Yoro, with his spouse and three daughters.  He’s been doing agricultural work since he was a little boy learning alongside his father.  Now he’s been caring for his own basic grains crops for the last 15 years.  He produces corn and beans that he sells in the local market.

He’s asking for a 4,000 lempira loan to buy fertilizer and manure and to pay labor costs to maintain his corn and bean crops.  With this investment he hopes to have good harvests with better quality products.  His plan is to improve his family’s quality of life and to always obtain income for his family’s daily sustenance.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Enrrique

texts.es:
Enrique esta casado y tiene dos hijos que están en etapa escolar, viven en casa de sus padres ocupando dos habitaciones que tienen piso de tierra, la casa esta ubicada en la zona Sopocachi de la ciudad de La Paz.
El estudió solo hasta la secundaria y actualmente trabaja como chofer de transporte público por más de doce horas al día ya que debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación, educación y pago de servicios básicos de su familia como el único que los mantiene.
El crédito lo requiere para pagar los estudios universitarios de su hijo en la carrera de Derecho ya que con lo poco que gana no le alcanza para poder pagarlos.
El sueño de Enrique es mejorar sus ingresos para ayudar a sus hijos hasta que sean profesionales y de esta forma mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la segunda vez que solicita el crédito en IMPRO y la primera junto a KIVA.
texts.en:
Enrique’s married and has two children who are still attending school.  He lives in his parents’ house occupying two rooms with dirt floors located in the city of La Paz’s Sopocachi zone.

He studied up to secondary school and currently works as a public transportation provider more than 12 hours daily since he must cover food, education and basic utility costs for his family; he’s the only source of support.

He needs the loan to pay for his son’s university costs; he’s studying Law and what he earns isn’t sufficient to be able to pay them.

Enrique’s dream is to improve his income in order to help his children until they become professionals thus improving their quality of life.

This is the second loan request to IMPRO and first to KIVA.

loans.use: to pay his son's university costs.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha es viuda y tiene un hijo el cual ya es independiente, vive en casa propia ocupando dos habitaciones las cuales tienen paredes de ladrillo y el piso de tierra, la casa esta ubicada en la zona Cuidad Satélite de El Alto.
Actualmente percibe renta ya que es jubilada del Magisterio, con el cual cubre los gastos de alimentación y pago de servicios básicos ya que vive ella sola.
El crédito lo requiere para el pago de estudios de su nieta ya que desea ayudarle a su hijo por que el no gana mucho y gasta demasiado en el pago de alquileres.
El sueño de Martha es que su nieta sea profesional y de esta forma ayudarle a mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la segunda vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Martha’s a widow and has a son who is now independent.  She lives in her own house occupying two rooms that have brick walls and a dirt floor and is located in the city of El Alto’s Ciudad Satélite zone.

She currently receives a pension since she’s a retired teacher that covers food and basic utilities since she lives alone.

She needs the loan to pay for her granddaughter’s schooling because she wants to help her son who does not earn very much and spends too much on rent.

Martha’s dream is that her granddaughter becomes a professional and to help her this way to improve her quality of life.

This is the second time she’s requested a loan from IMPRO and KIVA.

loans.use: to pay her granddaughter's school costs.

loans.name: Maira Estela

texts.es:
Maira, vive con su esposo y tres hijos de 21, 19 y 17 años de edad, ella se dedica al destazo de cerdos y reces, así como la venta de tortillas, este negocio surgió por su madre quien inició desde hace 15 años este negocio, ella lo aprendió como una alternativa para generar ingresos a su familia.

Solicita un préstamo para comprarse cerdos para la crianza, también se comprará maíz y leña, para la producción de las tortillas, este crédito cubrirá la necesidad de Maira en el negocio, además le dará los recursos y materiales necesarios para poder continuar en el negocio y seguir generando el sustento diario para su familia.
Aspira, mejorar su condición en el negocio y a través de este préstamo realizar una buena inversión que le de una mejor estabilidad.
texts.en:
Maira lives with her husband and three children who are 21, 19 and 17 years of age.  She butchers pigs and cattle as well as sells tortillas.  The business arose through her mother who started the business 15 years ago.  She learned it as an alternative way to earn family income.

She’s asking for a loan to buy pigs to raise and also to buy corn and firewood to make tortillas.  This loan will cover Maira’s business needs and will also give her the resources and materials needed to be able to stay in business and continue generating daily sustenance for her family.

She aims at improving her business’ condition and through this loan to make a good investment that will lead to better stability.

loans.use: to buy pigs, corn and firewood.

loans.name: Jose Leonel

texts.es:
Jose, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para poderlo utilizar en la inversión de nueva mercadería como pantalones, camisas, celulares, y otros mercadería que compra en Panamá, pues en este país logra conseguir los precios más bajos para poder tener un mejor margen de ganancia en sus ventas.

Con el préstamo anterior logró mejorar su negocio aumentando el inventario, ya que esto le permite ofrecer a sus clientes una mejor variedad, sus ventas han aumentado permitiendo que mejor gastos de la condición de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Jose is requesting a new loan to invest in new merchandise like pants, shirts, cell phones, and other merchandise that he buys in Panama.  He manages to get the lowest prices in this country.  By doing so he is able to have a greater margin of income from his sales.

With the previous loan he managed to improve his business by increasing his inventory.  This allows him to offer his customers a better variety.  His sales have increased, which allows better expenses for the family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, cell phones.

loans.name: Zulma Del Carmen

texts.es:
Zulma, vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos de 16, 13 y 6 años de edad, se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, desde muy pequeña aprendió este trabajo con sus padres quienes también se dedicaron al negocio, para su familia tiene 10 años de estar realizando pues ha sido su fuente de ingresos para cubrir las necesidades en el hogar.

Solicita un préstamo para comprarse dos cerdos y pulimento (concentrado) para poderlos alimentar, esta compra a futuro representa una ganancia pues realizará la venta cuando los cerdos ya tienen un peso adecuado esto le ayudará para poder continuar en el negocio y así poder cubrir las necesidades de sus tres hijos.

Su aspiración trabajar por sus hijos brindándoles la educación necesaria, apoyándoles para que se pueda esforzar en sus estudios y el futuro sean profesionales.
texts.en:
Zulma lives in her own house with her three children who are 16, 13 and 6 years of age.  She raises pigs.  She learned this work since she was a little girl alongside her parents who also were in this business.  She’s been working for ten years for her family because it’s been the source of income to cover household needs.

She’s asking for a loan to buy two pigs and feed for them.  This purchase represents a future profit because she’ll sell the pigs when they reach adequate weight which will help her to stay in business and be able to cover her three children’s needs.

Her hope is to work for her children providing them with the necessary education supporting them so that they can study hard and become professionals in the future.

loans.use: to buy pigs and feed.

loans.name: Melvin Bohanerge

texts.es:
Melvin, vive con sus padres y hermanos, está soltero, en su familia todos trabajan por su parte se dedica a la agricultura, este negocio lo aprendió con su padre, quien le desde siempre se a dedicado a este trabajo, no tiene un horario establecido para realizar sus labores.
Solicita un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas como pesticidas, insecticidas, el abono, ya que esta compra le permitirá a Melvin realizar su trabajo en el campo y poder mejorar la producción en el cultivo.

Su aspiración es a futuro poder tener una casa propia, formar su familia y continuar realizando su trabajo en la agricultura.
texts.en:
Melvin lives with his parents and siblings.  He’s single.  In his family everyone works.  He works in agriculture, a business he learned from his father who has always worked at this.  He does not have a fixed work schedule for his tasks.

He’s asking for a loan to buy farm supplies like pesticide, insecticide and manure.  This purchase will allow Melvin to do his field work and improve crop yields.

His hope for the future is to have a house of his own, to form his family and continue working in agriculture.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Osman Adilson

texts.es:
Osman, esta solicitando un nuevo préstamo pará trabajar en la agricultura, este dinero lo invertirá en la compra de seis sacos de abono y un depósito de herbicidas, éstos materiales son utilizados cada vez que se inicia la siembra de maíz y frijol para poder proteger la plantación de las plagas y mejorar la producción.

El efecto que tuvo con la inversión anterior fue aumentar la capacidad de producción, ya que obtuvo una buena cosecha, estos créditos han ayudado a mejorar y fortalecer su producción, apoyando su familia con todos los recursos que genera a través de las ventas de la cosecha.
texts.en:
Osman is asking for a new loan to work in agriculture.  He will use this money to buy six sacks of manure and a container of herbicide.  These supplies are used every time he starts a new corn and bean crop to protect it from infestations and to improve crop yields.

His previous investment had the effect of increasing production capacity in that he obtained a good harvest.  The loans have helped him to improve and strengthen his production supporting his family with the resources generated through the sale of his harvest.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Israel Antonio

texts.es:
Israel, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para realizar la compra de lubricantes, pues considera que con la inversión anterior logró aumentar su inventario permitiéndole servir a un mayor número de clientes, además esa compra la obtuvo a un mejor precio ya que compró por mayor cantidad.

El considera que la buena disponibilidad de lubricantes le ha permitido crecer atendiendo más clientes.
texts.en: Israel’s asking for a new loan to buy lubricants because he believes that the previous investment helped him increase his inventory thus being able to serve a larger number of customers.  In addition, he was able to get a better price for that purchase because he bought in larger amounts.  He believes that having lubricants on hand has made it possible for him to take care of more customers.

loans.use: to buy lubricants.

loans.name: Henry Alexander

texts.es:
Henry, se dedica a atender una tienda de productos de primera necesidad, el negocio surgio por iniciativa propia decidió tener una fuente de ingresos para solventar sus necesidades.

Él solicita un préstamo para la compra de arroz, azúcar, aceite, Sal, este préstamo le ayudará a incrementar el inventario de la mercadería y poder mejorar el servicio a sus clientes, ya que esto le permitirá tener una mejor rentabilidad.

Con el prestamo anterior logro realizarle mejoras a la vivienda, dandole mejor comodidad a su familia, y aun continua trabajando para una empresa de envio de encomiendas.
texts.en:
Henry takes care of a store that sells basic needs products.  The store emerged from he own initiative.  He decided to have a source of income in order to pay for the necessities.

He is requesting a loan to buy rice, sugar, cooking oil, and salt.  This loan will help him increase the inventory of his merchandise.  It will also help him to be able to give his customers better service.  This will allow him to have improved profits.

With the previous loan he managed to improve his house.  He made it more comfortable for his family.  He still continues to work for a delivery company.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, cooking oil, and salt.

loans.name: Maria Nelis

texts.es:
María, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para continuar en la producción de su negocio, se comprara medicamentos en cremas para diferentes enfermedades y también comprada ropa variada en estilos nuevos, también reparará una parte del techo en su vivienda, este préstamo será utilizado en diversidad de necesidades que María actualmente tiene, dándole un gran apoyo para mejorar su trabajo.

Como el préstamo anterior tuvo un efecto positivo ya que mejoró y estabilizó su situación económica en la familia, ella manifiesta que mientras tenga un apoyo económico, su negocio continuará creciendo y tendrán las herramientas para mantener a su familia en una calidad mejor.
texts.en:
María is seeking a new loan so that she can continue operating her business.  She will buy ointments for different illnesses and also purchase clothes in the latest styles.  She will also repair the ceiling in her home.  This loan will be used for a variety of her current needs and will help her to improve her business.

Her previous loan had a positive effect as it helped her to improve and stabilize her family's economic situation.  She reports that when she has economic support, her business will continue to grow, and she will have the tools she needs in order to bring her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy medicine and clothes.  She will also repair the ceiling in her home.

loans.name: Ana Vilma

texts.es:
Ana, quiere aumentar la capacidad del negocio por esto se ha decidido solicitar un nuevo préstamo que le permita invertir los fondos en la compra de maíz, leña, gas, para poder contar con lo necesario y mantener la producción de las tortillas, este credito sera solo para el negocio de las tortillas.

El efecto que tuvo con el préstamo anterior fue positivo, pues mejoró sus ventas y su inventario se mantuvo con un buen nivel, con la compra de ropa y de insumos para hacer las tortillas, manifiesta que está mejorando y generando mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Ana is seeking a new loan so that she can expand the capacity of her business.  She will invest the funds in corn, firewood and gas, so that she will have what she needs in order to maintain her production of tortillas.  This loan will be used only for her tortilla business.

Her previous loan had a positive effect, as it helped her increase her sales and keep her inventory at a good level.  With her purchase of clothes and the supplies she needs to make the tortillas, she reports that business is improving, and she is generating higher income.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood and gas.

loans.name: Maria Anita

texts.es:
María, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, ya que necesita comprar mercadería para abastecer el negocio con aquellos productos de primera necesidad que son más demandados, se comprara aceite, azúcar, huevos, frijoles, arroz, jabón y detergentes, los anteriores productos son los que normalmente necesita la clientela con eso a través de este préstamo espera satisfacer sus necesidades.

El préstamo anterior logró tener un buen efecto en el negocio, ya que logró mantener un buen nivel de productos a disposición de los clientes, eso le ha permitido mantener su preferencia.
texts.en:
María is seeking a new loan so that she can she can stock her store with those grocery items that are in the most demand. She will buy oil, sugar, eggs, beans, rice, soap and detergent.  These are what her customers normally need most, and with this loan she hopes to be able to meet their needs.

Her previous loan had a positive effect on the business, as it helped her to offer a good selection of products to her customers and provide them with the items that they prefer.

loans.use: to buy oil, sugar, eggs, beans, rice, soap and detergent.

loans.name: Yanira Elizabeth

texts.es:
Yanira, tiene 22 años de edad, vive con su esposo y su hijo de dos años, ella es ama de casa y realiza algunas labores agrícolas apoyando su esposo para poder obtener ingresos, realiza la siembra de maíz y tomates desde hace tres años.

Ella solicita un préstamo en invertir en la compra de abono para aplicarlo en la tomatera, ya que la siembra de maíz ya la realizó y también se aplicó el abono, este crédito le ayudara con el dinero para poder fortalecer la planta de tomates, asimismo poder sacar una buena cosecha que le ayude a comercializar y para la alimentación familiar.

El objetivo a futuro de Yanira, es poder mejorar sus cultivos ya que depende económicamente de ellos, además poder ofrecer a su hijo una condición de vida más estable.
texts.en:
Yanira is 22 and lives with her husband and two-year old son.  She is a housewife and does some agricultural work, supporting her husband, in order to gain income.  She has been cultivating corn and tomatoes for the last three years.

She is seeking a loan to buy fertilizer to apply to her tomato patch, since she has already finished the corn harvest, where she also applied fertilizer.  This loan will give her the money to fortify her tomato plants, so she can have a good harvest and good sales and help feed her family.

Yanira's goal for the future is to improve her farming, since she is economically dependent on it.  She also wants to offer her son a more stable lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer to cultivate tomatoes.

loans.name: Julio

texts.en:
Julio is 44 years old and lives with his family in his own home. He is a hardworking man and after a successful experience with Edpyme Alternativa and Kiva he is now looking for a new loan. He has proven to be very responsible and punctual.

He and his family live in the Tambogrande District, which belongs to Piura Department in Northern Peru. The only basic service their home has is lighting. The area is known for its agriculture, livestock economy, and handicrafts. Julio's business, which he has worked at for some years, is raising and selling farmyard animals (sheep and pigs). His corral is in the back part of his house. He feeds his livestock animal feed and natural grasses. He also has some of his own land on which he grows lemon trees. He generates income from both businesses and with it is able to cover his family's expenses. Julio has requested a loan of 1,500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa in order to purchase feed for his animals and some new animals to expand this side of his business. His goal is to offer a better price to the traders and improve his financial situation. Julio is a father who is concerned with his family having more comforts and with offering his children a better academic future.

loans.use: to purchase animals and feed for them

loans.name: Mariste

texts.en:
Mariste is 39 years old and lives in Butuay, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with three children. 

Mariste has a general store. She has had this business for one year. She has requested a loan of 12,000 PHP to purchase more stock for her general store.

Mariste has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future, Mariste hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store

loans.name: Ving's Group

texts.en:
A rural villager of Battambang province’s Ek Phnom district of Cambodia, Ving is a 57-year-old widowed mother of eight children. As a widow, she has struggled to earn a living through farming rice and has supplemented her family’s income by planting corn and watermelons for 30 years. She is able to earn about 20,000 Cambodian riels (HKR) per day from the current business. The main challenge for her business is low crop yield output.

Ving’s group received their first loan with Kiva’s partner VisionFund six loan cycles ago and completely repaid the loans. She has successfully used the past loans to better support her family’s needs. Now she is leading her group to apply for a loan with VisionFund. Ving is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and rice seeds for her farmland, and use a portion of it to spend for pumping water. She hopes to increase her crop yields to earn more income to make a better living.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and rice seeds for her farmland.

loans.name: Wendy Del Socorro

texts.es:
La joven Wendy de 28 años de edad, labora como responsable de caja del Gallo Mas Gallo desde hace 8  años, cuenta con la yuda econòmica de su esposo quien trabaja en Bancentro como perito agricol, ambos son jovenes trabajadores y reconocidos en el municipios como responsable y honesta con un alto espiritu de superacion.

Solicita este  crèdito para pagar parte del costo de una maestria en Docencia Universitaria en la Universidad Martin Lutero pues ella pretende superar y que el nivel academico adquirido le permita impartir clases a nivel profesional en una universidad que le brinde la oportunidad que ella tanto sueña.
texts.en:
The young woman Wendy is 28 years old. She has been working as the head cashier for El Gallo Mas Gallo for eight years. She has economic help from her husband, who works for Bancentro as an agricultural expert. Both are hard-working young people who are known in the municipalities as responsible and honest with a great spirit to achieve.

She is applying for this loan to pay part of the cost of a master's program in academic teaching at the Universidad Martin Lutero (Martin Luther University), since she intends to excel, and the academic level she would acquire would permit her to give classes at a professional level in a university, which would offer her the opportunity that she dreams of so much.

loans.use: to pay for a master's degree in teaching

loans.name: Anecita's Group

texts.en:
Anecita is 53 years old and lives in San Roque, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 9 children. 

Anecita has a hog-fattening business and earns approximately PHP 4,000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 14,900 PHP to be used in purchasing feed for her hog-fattening business. 

Anecita has been a member of PMPC for 8 years. In the future, Anecita hopes to engage in another type of business.  Anecita is the leader of a 2-person group.  Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loans.use: To be used in purchasing feed for her hog-fattening business

loans.name: Heang's Group

texts.en: Residing in a rural village of the Kror kor district of the Pursat province, Cambodia, Heang is 32 years old and married. She has two children (one daughter and one son) to take care of. To make a living, she has been in rice farming for ten years while her husband is a palm sugar maker and sometimes works as a paid worker. Together, they can earn about KHR 15,000 per day and manage to save about KHR 10,000 each day. Heang’s group consists of two members. She received her first loan with VisionFund one cycle ago and completely paid back her past loan. Heang successfully used the loan to better support her family's living. Now she is leading her group to request a new loan of KHR 300,000 each. As the leader, she will use her portion to buy a firewood-cutting machine to support the palm sugar producing business. With this loan, she hopes to earn more income so as to live with a better lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy a firewood cutting machine to support the sugar palm producing business

loans.name: Lean's Group

texts.en:
A rural villager from the Thmor Koul district of Battambang province, Cambodia, Lean is 47 years old and married. She has four children, two (one daughter and one son) of whom are living with the family and in school. She is a rice farmer on 3 hectares of farmland. Having been in this business for almost thirty years, she currently can earn about KHR 40,000 per day and manages to save about KHR 10,000 each day. The fruitless crop yield caused by drought is the main challenge for her business. 

This is the microloan for Lean’s group of two and she is a seventh loan cycle client. The past loans have helped her relieve her family’s burden. Now she is leading her group to apply for a loan with VisionFund. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers for her farmland, and use a portion of it  for labor costs. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her family’s income to make a better living.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for her farmland

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 49 years old and lives in San Roque, Pana-on, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 3 children. 

Gina has a general store. She has had this business for 15 years.  She requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to  purchase more stock for her general store.

Gina has been a member of PMPC for 8 years.  In the future, Gina hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store

loans.name: Baleria Estefania

texts.es:
Valeria, vive con su esposo y dos hijos de 11 años y 6 años de edad, la vivienda donde reside es alquilada, ella administra una tienda de productos de primera necesidad, por las tardes vende pupusas, también atiende un molino de nixtamal el cual tiene arrendado, de estas tres actividades logra obtener ingresos para apoyar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar.

Solicita un préstamo para poderlo invertir en la compra de granos básicos como frijoles, arroz, azúcar, también se comprará aceite, queso, quesillo, esta compra le permitirá surtir la tienda y así poder atender mejor a sus clientes, también podrá tener materia prima necesaria para la elaboración de pupusas.
Su objetivo es invertir en el negocio para darle la capacidad necesaria y atender mejor a sus clientes, en el corto plazo desea ser un buen cliente con sus pagos puntuales en este préstamo, pues así obtendrá las oportunidades de financiamiento a futuro.
texts.en:
Valeria lives with her husband and two children, ages 11 and 6. The house where they live is rented. She runs a store where she sells basic products. In the afternoon she sells pupusas (a thick, stuffed corn tortilla, a typical Salvadoran dish). She also tends a mill for corn flour, which she leases. From these three activities, she manages to obtain income to help her husband with the household expenses.

She is applying for a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of basic grains such as beans, rice, and sugar. She will also buy oil, cheese, and soft cheese. This purchase will allow her to stock her store and thus be able to serve her customers better. She will also be able to have the raw materials necessary to make pupusas. Her goal is to invest in her business to give it the necessary volume and better serve her customers. In the short term, she wants to be a good (loan) client and be punctual with her payments for this loan, since this way she will obtain opportunities for future financing.

loans.use: to buy beans, rice, sugar, oil, cheese, and soft cheese

loans.name: Zoraida

texts.es:
La socia  es la señora  Zoraida, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de los Milagros de Chimpahuaylla” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. Nuestra socia  se sigue dedicando a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en su tienda de abarrotes,  Zoraida trabaja en su comercio hace algún tiempo y es con esta actividad que con la que cría a su 2 pequeños Hijos. La socia en esta oportunidad invertirá su préstamo para capitalizar su actividad y comprará mercaderías como arroz, azúcar, leche, fideos, bebidas gaseosas y cerveza por cajas para estoquear su tienda.
Zoraida está muy agradecida con KIVA por permitirle mantenerse con su actividad, llevar el sustento a su casa y proporcionarles una mejor vida a sus hijos.
texts.en: Zoraida belongs to the communal bank “Señor de los Milagros de Chimpahuaylla” in the city of Cusco, Peru. She continues to make a living selling basic foodstuffs in her grocery. Zoraida has worked in her shop for some time and it is with this activity that she raises 2 small children. For this opportunity, she will invest her loan in growing her business and she will buy merchandise like rice, sugar, milk, noodles, sodas and cases of beer in order to stock her store. Zoraida is very grateful to KIVA for allowing her to maintain her business, support her home, and provide a better life for her children.

loans.use: To buy rice, sugar, milk, noodles, sodas and beer

loans.name: Odbaatar

texts.en:
Odbaatar is 41 years old and lives with his wife, daughter, and son in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. His family lives in a small house in one of the outer districts of the city. For over 15 years, Odbaatar has been operating a clothing stall at the largest outdoor market in Mongolia. He mostly sells children’s clothing and products imported from Beijing and Ereen, a border city of China. 

Odbaatar runs his business with working capital of 4,000,000 MNT. His general income is usually high and he makes 50% profit from his business. His family bought a plot of land in 2003 with his earnings and Odbaatar also managed to buy a used car in 2009.

Odbaatar is requesting a 1,000,000 MNT loan to import more clothes to sell in the summer. His goal is to support his children’s education and provide them with good living conditions in the future. Odbaatar is pleased to have this opportunity to expand his business with assistance from Kiva lenders, to whom he is very thankful. This is his third loan through Kiva.

loans.use: to import clothes to sell for summer.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
La socia  es la señora Hilda, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de los Milagros de Chimpahuaylla” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. La socia es profesora y se sigue dedicando a la docencia en una de las escuelas de la ciudad,  Hilda realiza estas actividad hace tiempo y es con esta que ha sacado adelante a sus 3  hijos, aun dependientes de ella.  La socia trabaja para poder darles a sus hijos una mejor educación, y por ello invertirá su préstamo estrictamente para pagar la educación de sus hijos ya que los 3 se encuentran en edad escolar y estudios académicos superiores, los cuales representan  mucho gasto, en este caso inversión
Hilda desea sacar profesionales a todos sus hijos y que estos algún día puedan tener un mejor porvenir, ese es el anhelo de la sacrificada socia
Hilda está muy feliz y agradecida con KIVA por permitirle dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y ayudarla a educar a sus hijos.
texts.en:
This communal bank member is Señora Hilda. She belongs to the communal bank "Señor de los Milagros de Chimpahuaylla" (Lord of the Miracles of Chimpahuaylla) in the city of Cusco, Peru. She is a teacher, and she continues to work in teaching in one of the city schools. Hilda has been doing this work for some time, and it is with this work that she has raised her three children, who still depend on her. She works to be able to give her children a better education, and for this reason she will invest her loan strictly to pay for the education of her children, since the three are of school age and are in higher level schools, which poses many expenses, and in this case, investment.

Hilda wants all her children to have careers and to someday have a better future. This is the desire of this sacrificing bank member. Hilda is very happy and grateful to Kiva for allowing her to give a better quality of life to her family and helping her to educate her children.

loans.use: to pay for the education of her children

loans.name: Yuliana

texts.en:
Yuliana, 38, is a married woman who has been blessed with three children: 
1.	Rosni , 18, is in the 3rd grade of Junior High School
2.	Rina, 16, is in the 2nd grade of Vocational school
3.	Angelina, 13, is in the 1st grade of Junior High school
Yuliana is responsible managing and organizing both her household and seamstress business. With the sewing skills that she has, Yuliana is able to produce additional income for her family. She receives orders to sew some clothes such as Kebaya (traditional cloth), school uniforms, blouses, skirts, trousers, sheets, and party dresses. The income generated from the business depends on the number of customers and the orders that she gets.Yuliana would like to start another business selling tamarind and candlenut; therefore she requested a loan of IDR 10,000,000 from TLM. She would like to buy two tons of tamarind and candlenut to be resold.

loans.use: to purchase tamarind and candlenut to be resold.

loans.name: Semuel

texts.en:
Semuel is a 45 year old man and is married to Susana, a 45 year old woman. Semuel has been blessed with four children: Darius, 22 and married; Desi, 18, and attending senior high school grade 3; Jimawati, 15, and Marice, 13, both attending junior high school grade 3 and 2, respectively. 

Semuel is a fishmonger, selling fish around his residence. Semuel has to walk daily about 10 km to reach the market, but sometimes he uses a motor taxi. 

Semuel really wants to improve his daily income as he realized that his children will need more money for their educational fees. The situation led Semuel to request a loan from TLM amounting to IDR 5,000,000. He plans to use the loan to buy more fish and vegetables to be sold by his wife.

loans.use: to buy more fish and vegetables to be resold by his wife.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 40 years old and married with four children.

Gina works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items to sell in her general store.

Gina has borrowed and paid 17 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for seven years and also earns an income from food vending.

Gina aspires to save enough so she could afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase additional items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Joan

texts.en:
Joan works hard to support her family. Joan is married and has a tricycle transport business in the Philippines.

Joan requested a PHP 17000 loan through NWTF to buy new tools and equipment for her tricycle and grocery products to sell in her general store.

Joan has been in this business for three years now.

In the future, Joan would like to build and expand her business to support the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy new tools and equipment for her tricycle and grocery products to sell in her store.

loans.name: Lukas

texts.en: Lukas, 56, is a father of two children, Diva, 4, and Glen, 1. Lukas produces income for his family by operating a kiosk business. As an entrepreneur, Lukas recognized that ups and downs have been a part of his business experience. Lukas really wants to have more kiosk stock to be able to generate more income. To implement his plan, he requested a loan amounting to IDR 5,000,000 from TLM. He would like to use the loan to buy mobile phone chargers, and snacks, beverages and cakes.

loans.use: to buy mobile phone chargers, and snacks, beverages and cakes to be sold.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is 39 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. 
Lydia is making and selling snacks like banana cake and hot cake in her community. Aside from that she also has a sari-sari (convenience) store that sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for six years. She requested a loan for 5,000 PHP to buy raw ingredients for making snacks such as flour, banana chips, cheese and sugar.
Lydia has been a member of HSPFI since 2007 .In the future, Lydia hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making snacks.

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es:
El socio continua dedicandose a la ganderia ,el socio cria a la vacas para luego venderlas en las ferias de los fines de semana en el distrito de Anta ,el socio lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,el socio es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia,el socio a la vez trabaja en construccion civil ,el trabaja en este rubro cada vez que solicitan sus servicios el resto de los dias el socio se dedica a la ganaderia.


El socio solicita el credito para la compra de alimentos para sus animales como forraje verde(alfalfa).
 El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues to make a living at animal husbandry.  Rigoberto raises cows to sell them later at the weekend markets in the district of Anta.  He has been in this business for years which is going well thanks to the determination that he puts into his business every day.  The member is a responsible and hard-working person and being this way he helps his family to get ahead.  Rigoberto works at the same time in civil construction.  He works in this area each time his services are requested and the other days he makes a living at animal husbandry.

The member is applying for a loan to buy food for his animals like green forage (alfalfa).  He is happy for the loan and promises to comply with the payments of his installments.

loans.use: to buy food for his animals like green forage (alfafa).

loans.name: Elvis

texts.es:
Nuestro socio  es el señor  Elvis, él pertenece al banco comunal “Señor de los Milagros de Chimpahuaylla” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. Nuestro socio sigue dedicándose a la ganadería, principalmente a la compra engorde y venta de ganado vacuno, actividad que se ha venido incrementando los últimos años gracias a su esfuerzo y sacrificio, Elvis en esta oportunidad invertirá su préstamo para comprar toretes para su crianza.
El gran sueño de Elvis es hacer crecer a su negocio y convertirse en un ganadero reconocido. Elvis agradece a  KIVA por permitirle desarrollarse con su actividad y seguir creciendo cada vez mas.
texts.en:
This communal bank member is Señor Elvis. He belongs to the communal bank "Señor de los Milagros de Chimpahuayalla" (Lord of the Miracles of Chimpahuaylla) in the city of Cusco, Peru. He continues to work in cattle raising, principally in the purchase, fattening, and sale of cattle, an activity that he has been increasing in recent years thanks to his effort and sacrifice. At this time Elvis will invest his loan in the purchase of young bulls to raise.

Elvis' great dream is to expand his business and become a recognized cattle raiser. Elvis is grateful to Kiva for allowing him to develop his business and continuing to grow it more and more.

loans.use: to buy young bulls

loans.name: Fermine

texts.en:
Fermine is 45 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with six children. 

Fermine is providing habal-habal or motorcycle services. He has had this business for eight years. He requested a loan of 5,000 to buy tools & pay for gasoline for the services.

Fermine has been a member of HSPFI since 2012.  In the future, Fermine hopes to improve his services for the education of his children.

loans.use: to buy tools and pay for gasoline

loans.name: John Mhar

texts.en: John Mhar is 28 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with two children. John Mhar is working as a security guard in a private institution while his wife operates their food/retail shop or sari-sari store where she buys & sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. They have had this business for four years. He requested a loan for 5,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages. John Mhar has been a member of HSPFI since 2008. In the future, he hopes to improve his business for the education of his children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Phalla's Group

texts.en:
Originally from a rural village of the Ek Phnom district of Battambang province, Phalla is a 55-year-old widow and mother of three children. To earn a living, she has been a garment worker for 30 years. The current business earns her approximately KHR 40,000 per day and manages to save about KHR 20,000 each day after daily expenses.

Phalla’s group consists of two members who live in the same village. Phalla is in her fifth cycle with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund while the other member is in her sixth cycle. The past loans have helped her family with a better living. Now leading her group to apply for a loan of KHR 1,400,000 each, Phalla, who is the leader, will use her portion to buy clothes and material for sewing, and use a portion of it to purchase a sewing machine for expanding her business. She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her income so as to improve her family’s living condition.

loans.use: to buy clothes and material for sewing.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making snacks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional boxes of dried fish to sell and other stock to sell in her mini grocery store

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel is 36 years old and married to Oktoviana, 28. He has a 5-year-old daughter named Aatana who is attending kindergarten.  
Daniel operates two businesses: a repair shop and a kiosk business. The income generated from both businesses helps him meet his family needs. Daniel is thinking of improving his kiosk business by adding more products and therefore requested a loan IDR 5,000,000 from TLM. Daniel plans to spend the loan on more kiosk stock, and tires, lubricant oil, and spark plugs for the repair shop business.

loans.use: to provide more kiosk stock, and  tires, lubricants, and spark plugs for the repair shop business.

loans.name: Gleceria

texts.en:
As a married mother of five children, Gleceria works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from fish vending. Gleceria is borrowing PHP 14000 through NWTF to buy fishing gear and other equipment for her fishing business.

Gleceria has been sustaining her business activities through her past nine loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fishing gear and other equipment.

loans.name: Emilia

texts.es: Emilia es socia del Banco Comunal Las Gaviotas, tiene 73 años de edad, es madre soltera de 2 hijos varones. Es socia de FINCA Perú hace 3 años. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa en su propia tienda. En todo este tiempo como socia de FINCA Perú, Emilia ha aprendido la importancia de la puntualidad y de la responsabilidad. Su sueño para el futuro es que pueda progresar al lado de su familia a través de su trabajo y una actitud positiva. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de ropa para caballeros, damas y niños para que aumente la selección de ropa que ofrece a sus clientes.
texts.en: Emilia is a member of the Banco Comunal Las Gaviotas.  She is 73 years old and has two adult sons.  She has been a member of FINCA Peru for the last three years.  She makes a living selling clothing from her store.  In her time with FINCA Peru Emilia has learned the importance of punctuality and responsibility.  Her dreams for the future are to succeed in her business with a good attitude and her family by her side.  The loan she is seeking will be invested in clothing for men, women, and children.  This will help her increase the product offering for her customers.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for men, women, and children

loans.name: Merlisa

texts.es: Merlisa es socia del Banco Comunal Las Gaviotas, tiene 37 años de edad, es conviviente y madre de 3 hijos (2 varones y una mujer).Es socia de FINCA Perú hace 1 año. Ella se dedica a la venta de pescado, en su negocio donde atiende los días sábados y domingos para ofrecer el pescado más fresco. Merlisa nos comenta que en su experiencia como socia de FINCA Perú ha aprendido que siempre tiene que ahorrar  e invertir de manera adecuada en su negocio. Su sueño para el futuro es brindarles una buena educación a sus hijos para que ellos puedan ser profesionales, además Merlisa quiere seguir ahorrando para realizar mejoras en su vivienda. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en su negocio en la compra de varios tipos de pescados.
texts.en:
Merlisa, 37, is a member of Las Gaviotas Communal Bank.  She lives with her life partner and is the mother of three children (two boys and a girl).  She has been a member of FINCA Perú for a year.  She works selling fish in her business on Saturdays and Sundays to offer the freshest fish.  Merlisa says that in her experience as a member of FINCA Perú she has learned that she always has to save and invest adequately in her business.

Her dream for the future is to give her children a good education so they can be professionals.  Merlisa also wants to continue saving to make improvements on her home.

She is going to invest the loan she is requesting in buying various types of fish.

loans.use: to buy various types of fish.

loans.name: Marco

texts.es: Marco es socio del Banco Comunal Las Gaviotas, tiene 33 años de edad, es conviviente y es padre de 1 hija. Es socio de FINCA Perú hace 2 años. Marco es dueño de una tienda de calzados donde vende muchos tipos de zapatos. Marco también es estudiante de Ciencias Sociales, de esta manera quiere ser un modelo a seguir para su hija y brindarle lo que ella necesita y que el no pudo tener. La lección más grande que Marco ha aprendido durante este tiempo como socio de FINCA Perú es ahorrar, el dice que las capacitaciones que recibe en su Banco Comunal son muy útiles y le permiten aprender la importancia de las inversiones en su negocio. Su sueño es que si hija pueda ser una persona exitosa y que consiga mas logros que él. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de varios tipos de calzado como zapatos, zapatillas, sandalias para adulto y niños.
texts.en:
Marco is a member of Banco Comunal Las Gaviotas.  He is a 33 year-old father of one daughter.  He has been a member of FINCA Peru for the last two years.  Marco is the owner of a shoe store where he sells a wide variety of shoes.  Marco also studies the social sciences and through this he wishes to be a role model for his daughter and giver her everything she needs - and all that he was not able to have growing up.  

The biggest lesson Marco has learned during his membership at FINCA Peru is saving.  He says the training he receives at the communal bank are very useful and permit him to learn the importance of investments in his business.  His dream is that his daughter will become very successful and achieve more than him.  He will invest this loan to purchase footwear such as shoes, slippers, and sandals for adults and children.

loans.use: to purchase shoes, slippers, and sandals for adults and children.

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es: Bertha es socia del Banco Comunal Las Gaviotas, tiene 43 años de edad, es casada y madre de 2 hijas.Es socia de FINCA Perú hace 2 años. Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes. Ella dice que todo este tiempo como socia de FINCA Perú  ha sido una muy buena experiencia,  se siente orgullosa de todo lo que ha logrado ahorrar. Su sueño para el futuro es seguir ahorrando para que pueda brindar una buena educación a su hija, para ella es muy importante que su hijita tenga la oportunidad de ser profesional. Además Bertha está ahorrando poco a poco para que pueda construir una casa que comparta con su familia. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería para su negocio como arroz, azúcar, leche, fideos, harina, aceite, bebidas, etc.
texts.en: Bertha is a member of the village bank Las Gaviotas. She is 43 years old, married and a mother of two daughters. She has been a member of FINCA Peru for two years. She has a grocery store. She says that the time that she has been a member of FINCA Peru has been a very good experience. She feels proud of what she has been able to save. Her dream for the future is to keep saving so she can give her daughter a good education. It's very important to her that her young daughter has the opportunity to become a professional. What's more, Bertha is saving little by little to be able to build a house to share with her family. The requested loan will be used to purchase merchandise for her business like rice, sugar, milk, noodles, flour, oil, drinks, etc.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, milk, noodles, flour, oil, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Pablita

texts.en:
Pablita is 52 years old and married with 7 children.

She earns a living by raising livestock in the Philippines. Pablita is borrowing PHP 25000 through NWTF to purchase additional livestock to raise.

Pablita has been raising livestock for 22 years and also earns additional income from farming sugarcane and vegetables.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional livestock to raise

loans.name: Haydee

texts.es: Haydee es socia del Banco Comunal Las Gaviotas, tiene 43 años de edad, es casada y madre de 2 hijos (un varón y una mujer). Es socia de FINCA Perú hace 2 años. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa. Ella dice que ser socia de FINCA Perú ha sido una buena experiencia porque aprendió a ser responsable y puntual, siempre está en la hora indicada en sus reuniones de su Banco Comunal. Su sueño para el futuro es poder tener una casa que comparta con su familia, amoblar su vivienda y que si capital de negocio crezca. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería para su negocio como ropa para caballeros, damas y niños.
texts.en: Haydee is a member of the village bank Las Gaviotas. She is 43 years old, married and a mother of two children (one boy and one girl). She has been a member of FINCA Peru for two years. She sells clothing. She says that being a member of FINCA Peru has been a good experience because she learned to be responsible and punctual; she is always there at the appointed time for her meetings with the village bank. Her dream for the future is to be able to have a house to share with a family, to furnish her home, and to increase her business capital. The requested loan will be invested in merchandise for her business like clothing for men, women and children.

loans.use: to buy clothing for men, women and children.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Maria Magdalena

texts.es:
Maria Magdalena tiene 35 años, Es soltera vive con los padres y con los hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. LUCHANDO POR UNA MISMA CAUSA, se encuentra ubicada en el en el Recinto La primavera, perteneciente al Canton Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz.

Maria Magdalena se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y frejol gandúl, además se dedica a la cría de gallinas, cerdos. Los productos los compra en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semilla, insumos, ranger, fertilizantes para los cultivos. Con el apoyo del crédito ha podido sembrar económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es sembrar más hectareas de terreno.

En el tiempo libre le gusta realizar los quehaceres domésticos.
texts.en:
Maria Magdalena, 35, is single and lives with her parents and her children in Ventanas Canton in the province of Los Ríos.

The members of the Luchando por una Misma Causa communal bank are located in the precinct of La Primavera in Ventanas Canton.  This communal bank works on short-cycle agricultural labor growing corn and rice.

Maria Magdalena works in agriculture growing corn and pigeon peas.  She also raises chickens and pigs.  She buys her products in Ventanas.

She is requesting the loan to buy seed, supplies, Ranger, and fertilizer for the crops.  With the support of the loan she has been able to plant economically to supply her needs.  Her dream is to plant more hectares of land.

In her free time she likes to do housework.

loans.use: to buy seed, supplies, Ranger, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Javier

texts.es:
Nuestro socio  es el señor  Javier, él pertenece al banco comunal “Los Hijos de Qolquewasi” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. Nuestro socio sigue dedicándose a la atención de su restaurante juntamente con la ayuda de su hija, Javier en esta oportunidad invertirá su préstamo para comprar insumos como arroz, papas, fideos, verduras, bebidas gaseosas y cerveza para la producción de su restaurante.
El gran sueño de Javier es poder ampliar y mejorar su restaurante para algún dia dejar la posta a su hija quien lo apoya en todo. Javier agradece a  KIVA por permitirle desarrollarse con su actividad y seguir creciendo cada vez mas.
texts.en:
Javier belongs to the communal bank “Los Hijos de Qolquewasi” (Sons of Qolquewasi) in the city of Cusco, Perú. He continues dedicating himself to running his restaurant with the help of his daughter. With this opportunity, Javier will use his loan to buy supplies such as rice, potatoes, noodles, vegetables, soft drinks, and beer to serve in his restaurant. 

Javier’s greatest dream is to be able to expand and improve his restaurant so that someday, he can leave the job to his daughter, who supports him in everything. Javier is grateful to Kiva for allowing him to develop in his work and continue to grow more each time.

loans.use: to purchase rice, potatoes, noodles, vegetables, soft drinks, and beer.

loans.name: Doris

texts.es:
La socia  es la señora  Doris, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Los Hijos de Qolquewasi” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. Nuestra socia  se sigue dedicando a la venta de productos diversos en su bazar, principalmente ropa para bebés,  Doris trabaja en su comercio hace algún tiempo y es con esta actividad que cría y educa a su única hija que aun está en edad escolar, y quien la acompaña y ayuda en esta actividad. La socia en esta oportunidad invertirá su préstamo para capitalizar su actividad y comprará mercaderías como ropa para bebés, y algunos artículos como joyería de fantasía y regalos.
Doris desea ofrecerle todo lo mejor a su hija, quien es el motivo de su vida y sacrificio, para que algún dia en el futuro pueda ser una persona de bien y una profesional de provecho.
Doris está muy agradecida con KIVA por permitirle mantenerse con su actividad, llevar el sustento a su casa y proporcionarle una buena educación a su única hija.
texts.en:
Doris belongs to the village bank "Los Hijos de Qolquewasi" in the city of Cusco, Peru. She continues selling diverse products in her bazaar, primarily baby clothes. She has worked in her business for some time and with it has raised and educated her only daughter, who is still in school and also accompanies her and helps her at work. On this occasion she will invest her loan to capitalize on her business and buy merchandise like baby clothes and some articles like costume jewelry and gifts. Doris wants to offer her daughter the best, which is the motivation for her life and her sacrifice, so that one day she can be a better person and a good professional.

Doris is grateful to Kiva for allowing her to take care of herself with her business, sustaining her home and giving her only daughter a good education.

loans.use: to buy baby clothes and some articles like costume jewelry and gifts.

loans.name: Lara Grace

texts.en: Lara Grace is 36 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. Lara Grace has a food/retail shop or sari-sari store where she buys & sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products & beverages. She has had this business for six years. She requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks & beverages. Lara Grace has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, Lara Grace hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es: Hilda es socia del Banco Comunal Las Gaviotas, tiene 30 años de edad, es conviviente y madre de 3 hijos. Es socia de FINCA Perú hace 6 meses. Ella es docente en una escuela primaria y tiene un negocio donde se vende ropa. Comenta que FINCA Perú la ha ayudado a aprender la importancia de ahorrar e invertir en si propio negocio. Su sueño para el futuro es que sus hijos sean profesionales y construir una casa para que viva con su familia. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de ropa para caballeros, dama y niños.
texts.en: Hilda is a member of the communal bank Las Gaviotas (The Seagulls). She is 30 years old, has a live-in partner, and is the mother of 3 children. She has been a member of FINCA Perú for 6 months. She is a teacher in a primary school and has a business where she sells clothes. She says that FINCA Perú has helped her to learn the importance of saving and investing in her own business. Her dream for the future is that her children will be professionals, and to build a house so she can live with her family. The loan that she is requesting will be used to purchase clothing for men, women, and children.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for men, women, and children.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock of canned goods, snacks, and beverages

loans.name: Handhuu

texts.en: Handhuu, aged 46, lives with her family in a ger district of Ulaanbaatar city. Her husband Munhjargal, 46, is running a taxi service business. Her 21-year-old daughter is a college student and her 17-year-old son stays at home because he has a brain tumor. Handhuu wants to start a mobile trade, selling ready-made women's and kids clothes which are imported from China. She found space to rent along the central road.  She is planning to start the business and is applying to for 3,500,000 MNT loan to buy the supply of chic brand-name clothes. Handhuu is an ethical and punctual woman recognized by customers and also is a client of the ecological department of the Bank.

loans.use: To buy a supply of chic brand-name clothes

loans.name: Gina Patricia

texts.es:
La socia  es la señora Gina, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Los Hijos de Qolquewasi” de la ciudad del Cusco – Perú. La socia es una joven madre de familia con 2 hijas pequeñas, que se sigue dedicando al comercio de productos de belleza, venta que realiza por catalogo y que ha sabido mantener gracias a su simpatía para llegar a sus clientes que mayormente son mujeres.
Gina en esta oportunidad invertirá el préstamo solicitado para comprar mercadería como maquillaje y perfumería para estoquearse y capitalizar su actividad. Gina está muy agradecida con KIVA por permitirle dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, una mejor educación a sus hijas y por ayudarla con el crecimiento y fortalecimiento de sus actividades.
texts.en:
The member, Gina, belongs to Los Hijos de Qolquewasi Communal Bank in the city of Cusco, Peru.  She is a young mother with two small daughters who continues to work selling beauty products.  She conducts her business via catalog and has been able to maintain it thanks to her friendliness in reaching her customers, who are primarily women.

This time Gina will invest the requested loan in buying merchandise such as make-up and perfume to stock up and reinvest in her business.

Gina is very grateful to Kiva for allowing her to give her family a better quality of life and her daughters a better education, and for helping her with grow and strengthen her activities.

loans.use: to buy make-up and perfume.

loans.name: Marvin

texts.es: Marvin, tiene la edad  de 32 años, está en unión libre,  vive con su esposa y la cual es su mayor prioridad. Él con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes y otros productos químicos, además pagar mano de obra para la aplicación de los productos y asistencia de la plantación, y de esta manera asegurarse de realizar un buen trabajo. Lo que pretende es aprovechar las buenas condiciones de clima y suelo que cuenta para este cultivo, y también poner en práctica la experiencia de varios años en el manejo de granos básicos. Además de poder comprar los mejores productos y de mejor calidad para que su plantación tenga un buen desarrollo y sanidad, y tener a corto plazo una producción adecuada. Con el ingreso de la cosecha que espera obtener lo utilizarla en el bienestar y estudio de su familia y cumplir con algunas metas familiares y seguir invirtiendo más en los cultivos. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Marvin, 32, is in a common-law relationship.  He lives with his wife, who is his top priority.

With his loan he plans to buy fertilizers and other chemical products as well as pay for labor to apply the products and take care of the land.  This way he is assured of doing a good job.  He plans to make the most of the good climate and soil conditions he has for this crop.  He also will put into practice his several years of experience managing basic grains.  In addition to being able to buy the best products of the highest quality so his plantation will be well developed and healthy, in a short time he will have a suitable crop.

He will use the income from the harvest that he hopes to get for the well-being and studies of his family, and achieve some family goals and continue investing more in his crops.  This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. Previously, he had not had other loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR offered him a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to take care of his beans.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es: Lucia es socia del Banco Comunal Las Gaviotas, tiene 33 años de edad, es casada y madre de 3 hijos. Es socia de FINCA Perú hace 6 años. Ella se dedica a la venta de verduras, cada semana ella lleva verduras para vender a su pueblito desde la cuidad. En su experiencia como socia de FINCA Perú ella ha aprendido la importancia de los ahorros, la puntualidad y la responsabilidad. Su sueño para el futuro es poder comprar un terreno donde pueda construir su casa. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería para su negocio como zanahorias, papas, yucas, lechuga, hierbas, camote, cebollas, etc.
texts.en:
Lucia, 33,  is a member of Las Gaviotas Communal Bank.  She is married and the mother of three children.  She has been a member of FINCA Perú for six years.

She works selling vegetables.  Every week she takes vegetables to sell from the city to her little town.  In her experience as a member of FINCA Perú she has learned the importance of savings, punctuality, and responsibility.  Her dream for the future is to be able to buy a plot of land where she can build her house.

She will invest the loan she is requesting in merchandise for her business, such as carrots, potatoes, yucca, lettuce, herbs, sweet potato, onions, etc.

loans.use: to buy carrots, potatoes, yucca, lettuce, herbs, sweet potato, onions, etc.

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is 44 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has 5 children. 

Lorna sells used clothes, or ukay-ukay. She has had this business for 5 years. She has requested a loan for 5,000 to buy more ukay-ukay, or used clothes to re sell.

Lorna is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Lorna hopes to improve her business for the education of her children.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothes to re-sell.
